name: Inline Vanilla Functions
description: Optimizes the most frequent/expensive functions for various scenarios to decrease save/loading times and improve general performance. If you're using 'New Vegas Tick Fix' make sure it's updated (v9.6+).

name: No Screenshot Taken Popup
description: Stops the 'Screenshot: File ... created' pop-up appearing at the top right corner of the screen.

subsettings.name: Print To Console
subsettings.description: Print the screenshot created message to console.

name: No Karma Messages
description: Stops the sounds and messages for good and bad karma.

subsettings.name: Repeated Sound Ignore Interval
subsettings.description: Stops the bad karma sound repeating within the provided time (in milliseconds).

subsettings.name: Minimum Increase For Messages/Sounds
subsettings.description: Ignore karma messages and sounds if the increase in karma is below this value.

subsettings.name: Minimum Decrease For Messages/Sounds
subsettings.description: Ignore karma messages and sounds if the decrease in karma is below this value.

name: No Cripple/Critical Messages
description: Prevents the target crippled/critical hit popups.

subsettings.name: Remove Critical
subsettings.description: Remove critical hit messages.

subsettings.name: Remove Crippled
subsettings.description: Remove crippled target limb messages.

name: Run While Aiming
description: Remove the movement penalty associated with aiming.

subsettings.name: While Melee Blocking
subsettings.description: Remove the penalty for melee blocking.

subsettings.name: While Iron-Sighting
subsettings.description: Remove the penalty for iron sighting.

name: No Audio Distortion
description: Remove the audio distortion effect applied to actors wearing masks and intercoms.

subsettings.name: Deep Fried
subsettings.description: Apply the distortion to all sounds, not just NPCs wearing masks.

name: Scroll-wheeling Doesn't Change POV
description: Stops the point of view changing when zooming in/out (scrolling).

subsettings.name: First-Third Person
subsettings.description: Prevent scrolling changing view from first to third person.

subsettings.name: Third-First Person
subsettings.description: Prevent scrolling changing view from third to first person.

name: Faster Sleep Wait
description: Customize the delay between hours in the sleep/wait menu.

subsettings.name: Wait Time
subsettings.description: Time between hours in milliseconds.

subsettings.name: Don't Scale With Timescale
subsettings.description: Makes the wait time unaffected by the current timescale (e.g. sgtm command).

name: No PipBoy In Combat
description: Disallows use of the PipBoy during combat.

subsettings.name: Show Corner Message
subsettings.description: Enable corner messages 'No PipBoy in combat' or 'Not enough AP to use PipBoy in combat'.

subsettings.name: Allow Pipboy Using Action Points
subsettings.description: Allow the use of PipBoy for 'AP Cost' action points.

subsettings.name: AP Cost
subsettings.description: Number of action points used.

name: Jumping Costs AP
description: Makes jumping cost Action Points.

subsettings.name: AP cost
subsettings.description: Number of action pints used.

subsettings.name: Jump without enough AP
subsettings.description: If disabled, you will only be able to jump if you have enough AP.

name: Combined Post-Combat XP Bar
description: Delay XP pop-ups till the end of combat.

subsettings.name: Post-Combat Delay Time
subsettings.description: The amount of time after combat till the XP message will be shown.

name: No Skill Tags
description: Hides the [Perk], [Speech], [Barter], etc. tags from dialogue options.

subsettings.name: Remove Red Highlight
subsettings.description: Removes the red outline on dialogue options where the skill check would fail.

subsettings.name: Add Percent Symbol
subsettings.description: Show the % symbol on TTW percentage based speech checks (e.g. [Speech 20%] -> [Speech%]).

subsettings.name: Remove [Success] And [FAILED]
subsettings.description: Removes the [SUCCESS] and [FAILED] from responses.

subsettings.name: Hide XP Popups In Dialogue
subsettings.description: Hides XP pop-ups if earned during dialogue.

subsettings.name: Hide Misc Stats and Challenge Popups
subsettings.description: Hides the 'Speech Successes' and 'Speech Failures' in stats menu and challenge update corner messages.

options.name: Keep Skill But Remove Number
options.description: Remove the number but keep the skill visible, e.g. '[Speech] Whatever.'

name: Movement Penalties
description: Adds a configurable movement penalty for when the player is moving backwards or aiming.

name: Individual Hardcore Features
description: Enable toggling of individual hardcore features, separately from the game's hardcore setting.

subsettings.name: Essential Companions
subsettings.description: Makes companions unconscious instead of dying when losing all their health.

subsettings.name: Sleep Healing
subsettings.description: Toggle sleeping healing the player - NOTE: does not affect sleeping in player-owned beds as this is a scripted effect.

name: Fallout 76 Encumbrance
description: Enables running and jumping for Action Points while over-encumbered.

subsettings.name: AP drain cost
subsettings.description: Amount of AP drained every interval.

subsettings.name: AP drain interval
subsettings.description: Rate at which AP is drained (in ms).

subsettings.name: Jump AP cost
subsettings.description: Action points used to jump.

subsettings.name: Jump without enough AP
subsettings.description: Allows jumping while over-encumbered with 0 AP.

subsettings.name: Remove encumbrance message
subsettings.description: Removes the "You are over-encumbered and cannot run!" message.

subsettings.name: Allow running without enough AP
subsettings.description: Allows running while over-encumbered with 0 AP.

subsettings.name: Weight based AP drain
subsettings.description: Scale the AP drain by how overencumbered you are, i.e. iAPDrainCost * CurrentWeight/MaxWeight, so carrying 2x your max weight would double the AP drain.

subsettings.name: Overencumbered run speed multiplier
subsettings.description: Speed multiplier applied while running overencumbered.

name: Entering VATS Costs AP
description: Adds an AP penalty for entering VATS.

subsettings.name: Enter VATS AP cost
subsettings.description: Amount of action points used to enter VATS.

subsettings.name: No VATS without enough AP
subsettings.description: Stops VATS entering if there is not enough AP to fire the current weapon.

subsettings.name: Fail only
subsettings.description: Only charge AP if there were no targets found.

subsettings.name: No targets only
subsettings.description: Instead of charging AP when entering VATS, charge it if you exit VATS without selecting a target.

name: Save Manager
description: Use incremental save slots for autosave, optionally fullsaving every rotation.

subsettings.name: Reload Current Save key
subsettings.description: Hotkey to reload the current loaded save (as if the player died).

subsettings.name: Create Save key
subsettings.description: Hotkey to create a named save.

subsettings.name: Incremental Save key
subsettings.description: Hotkey to create a slot save. e.g. Courier - Save 1, Courier - Save 2...

subsettings.name: Maximum incremental saves
subsettings.description: Number of incremental save slots, when the max slot is reached it will begin overwriting from slot 0.

subsettings.name: Autosave timer
subsettings.description: Delay between timed autosaves in seconds.

subsettings.name: Maximum autosaves
subsettings.description: Number of autosave slots, when the max slot is reached it will begin overwriting from slot 0.

subsettings.name: Periodic fullsave
subsettings.description: Create a named save every time the max slot is reached.

subsettings.name: No autosave message
subsettings.description: Hide the mod and vanilla autosave messages.

subsettings.name: Save on "Location discovered"
subsettings.description: Autosave when a location is discovered.

subsettings.name: Save on "Quest completed"
subsettings.description: Autosave when a quest is completed.

subsettings.name: Save on game exit
subsettings.description: Autosave when exiting the game.

subsettings.name: Save on successful pickpocket exit
subsettings.description: Autosave when closing the container menu after pickpocketing without getting caught.

subsettings.name: Save on craft item
subsettings.description: Autosave when closing the recipe menu after crafting an item.

subsettings.name: Save before level up
subsettings.description: Autosave before the Level Up Menu is shown.

subsettings.name: Minimum autosave interval
subsettings.description: Prevent autosaves within this time of each other (in seconds) - affects both vanilla and timed autosaves.

subsettings.name: Incremental Save slot change interval
subsettings.description: Only increase the incremental save slot if it's been this long since last slot change (in seconds); e.g. when set to 60 seconds, any saves made within 0-60s of the first save in a slot will all overwrite each other - after that a new slot is used.

subsettings.name: No autosaves in combat
subsettings.description: Prevent timed autosaves in combat ([Danger]), saves occur between 0-8 seconds after combat ends.

subsettings.name: No autosaves in godmode
subsettings.description: Prevent timed autosaves if godmode is enabled.

subsettings.name: No scripted saves
subsettings.description: Prevent scripts saving the game (via SaveGame, ForceSave, AutoSave and SystemSave commands) - does not prevent vanilla autosaves e.g. saving on cell enter, use the settings menu for those.

subsettings.name: Add pause menu Quicksave button
subsettings.description: Replace the pause menu's 'Continue' button with a button to create an incremental save.

name: No Alt-TAB Pause
description: Stops the game showing the pause menu on alt-tab, recommend pairing with OneTweak's 'Active in Background' option to keep the game running when alt-tabbed.

name: Jump While Aiming
description: Allows jumping while aiming or blocking.

name: Midair Fast-Travel
description: Allows fast-travel in midair.

name: No XP Popups
description: Stops the XP pop-up and associated sound.

subsettings.name: Kills
subsettings.description: Disable XP pop-ups for kills.

subsettings.name: Discovering locations
subsettings.description: Disable XP pop-ups for discovering locations.

subsettings.name: RewardXP command
subsettings.description: Disable XP pop-ups from use of the RewardXP command.

subsettings.name: Speech challenges
subsettings.description: Disable XP pop-ups for successful speech checks.

subsettings.name: Hacking
subsettings.description: Disable XP pop-ups for hacking a terminal.

subsettings.name: Lockpick
subsettings.description: Disable XP pop-ups for successfully picking a lock.

subsettings.name: Disarming mines
subsettings.description: Disable XP pop-ups for disarming mines.

name: Better Auto-walk
description: Moving left or right does not cancel auto-walk (Q key).

subsettings.name: Allow backwards auto-walk
subsettings.description: Allows backwards autowalking by starting the autowalk while moving backwards.

name: Cheat Lockpick Menu
description: Shows the debug lock-pick menu on all lock-pick menus (cheat).

name: No Pip-Boy on Alt-TAB
description: Stops the PipBoy showing if tab is pressed while alt is held.

name: No Unconsious Message
description: Stops the 'Actor is now unconscious' message.

name: Manual Reload
description: Stops the player automatically reloading when the clip is emptied.

subsettings.name: Auto-reload clip size threshold
subsettings.description: If the weapon's clip size is less than this automatically reload when reaching 0 ammo.

subsettings.name: No reload on ammo pick up
subsettings.description: Prevents the automatic reload when ammo is picked up and your weapon is empty.

subsettings.name: No firing animation with empty clip
subsettings.description: Prevents the firing animation if the clip is empty.

subsettings.name: Automatic weapons play empty clip sound
subsettings.description: Play the empty clip sound when the clip is emptied for automatic weapons.

subsettings.name: Automatic weapons only
subsettings.description: Manually reload automatic weapons only. Semi-auto weapons will keep automatically reloading.

subsettings.name: Firing While Empty Reloads
subsettings.description: Reload when trying to fire with an empty clip.

name: NPCs Pause Between Dialogue Lines
description: Require clicking to change to the next line in dialogue, giving time to read what was said.

name: WASD Menu Controls
description: Allows use of WASD keys in menus, and space to accept - will not function if the keys conflict with menu key-binds. Recommend pairing with VUI+ and the 'WASD Compatible' option.

subsettings.name: Old Menu WASD
subsettings.description: Makes WASD buttons always act as arrow keys even if they would conflict with vanilla key-bindings.

subsettings.name: Always allow WASD
subsettings.description: Always allow WASD movement keys by ignoring WASD+E XML menu hotkeys.

subsettings.name: Repeat WASD keys
subsettings.description: Holding a WASD key repeats the action, as with arrow keys.

subsettings.name: Space does not close containers
subsettings.description: Stops the space key closing containers.

subsettings.name: Inventory selection always visible
subsettings.description: Stops the inventory selection disappearing when activating an item with keyboard input.

subsettings.name: Containers default to right side
subsettings.description: Makes the selection default to the right hand side when opening a container menu.

subsettings.name: Shift scales map zoom speed
subsettings.description: Holding shift scales the zoom speed.

subsettings.name: Shift scales container arrow keys
subsettings.description: Holding shift scales the arrow key scroll speed in containers.

subsettings.name: Shift scales mousewheel
subsettings.description: Holding shift scales the mouse-wheel scroll by 4 for all menus.

subsettings.name: Map menu WASD
subsettings.description: Holding alt allows WASD to move the map menu, up/down zooms.

subsettings.name: Map menu WASD centers reticle
subsettings.description: Using map menu WASD resets the selection reticle to the center of the screen.

subsettings.name: Select with "E" key
subsettings.description: Make the 'E' key behave like spacebar in menus.

subsettings.name: Tab returns to inventory
subsettings.description: Make Tab return to the Inventory rather than closing the PipBoy for the Weapon Mod and Repair menus.

subsettings.name: List scroll wraparound
subsettings.description: Make pressing up/down while at the top/bottom of a container jump to the bottom/top.

subsettings.name: Auto highlight main menu continue button
subsettings.description: Automatically highlight the 'Continue' option at the main menu.

name: Hide Enemies On Compass
description: Hides the enemy markers from the compass.

subsettings.name: Show firing enemies
subsettings.description: Show enemies who are currently firing their weapon on compass (enemies performing an attack animation).

name: Equip Broken Items
description: Allows equipping of broken items (to allow repair with weapon repair kits or skill bonus from apparel).

name: VATS Ignores Companions
description: Stops VATS targeting companions.

subsettings.name: Combat only
subsettings.description: Allow targeting companions in VATS if outside combat.

name: Don't Show Container After Lockpick
description: Stops the container menu showing automatically when opening with lock-pick or a key.

name: Keep Pipboy Light On When Changing Cells
description: Stops the PipBoy light turning off when entering an exterior cell.

subsettings.name: Turn light off if it's daytime
subsettings.description: Only turn the pipboy light off when entering an exterior between sunrise and sunset.

name: Use Mouse In Lockpick
description: Allows the use of left clicking to rotate during lock-pick (in addition to the default WASD).

name: No Hacking Retry Delay
description: Removes the delay between hacking attempts (same as changing the game-setting iHackingRetryMilliseconds to 0).

name: Jump While Overencumbered
description: Allow jumping while over-encumbered.

name: No Casino Max Bet
description: Removes the max bet in casinos and makes increments above 1500 increase by 500 (from 100 default).

name: Faster Save Menu Close
description: Removes a hard-coded 3 second delay before menu closing when saving using the pause menu.

name: No Quest Failed Popup
description: Stops the QUEST FAILED showing upon failing a quest.

subsettings.name: Show only if started
subsettings.description: Show the QUEST FAILED but only if the quest was started.

name: No Location Discovered Popup
description: Stops the Location Discovered showing.

name: No Ammo Casings
description: Stops shooting earning the player ammo casings.

name: Faster Hacking Transition
description: Decreases the delay after a successful hack by 2.5 seconds.

name: Keep Roulette Bet Amount
description: Don't reset the bet amount to 1 after playing roulette.

name: Console Numpad Support
description: Adds support for the numpad buttons /*-+., enter and 0-9 to be used in console.

name: Allow Activate While Anims Play
description: Allows activating while firing, reloading, jumping, landing etc. - This means you can start reloading, open a door and finish reloading on the other side.

name: Unvisited Interior Indicator
description: Appends a * to the activation prompt of doors leading to interior cells that have not been visited e.g. 'Door to Saloon * '.

subsettings.name: Unname unvisited cells
subsettings.description: Obscure the cell name to unvisited cells, e.g. Door to...

subsettings.name: Indicate respawned cells
subsettings.description: Append a + to the activation prompt of doors leading to cells that have respawned.

subsettings.name: Show visited cells instead
subsettings.description: Show a * on Visited cells instead of unvisited.

name: Skip Player Deathcam Hotkey
description: Adds a hot-key 'Left-Alt' or Back on controller to instantly end the player death-cam.

name: Descriptive Marker Added Message
description: Adds the marker location name to the 'Marker added.' pop-up.

name: VATS Ignores Invisible Targets
description: Disallow targeting invisible enemies in VATS.

name: Remove Downloads Button
description: Removes the useless downloads button from the main menu.

name: Hide Unmarked Map Locations
description: Only show unvisited locations on the compass if they are marked on the map.

name: Compass NPC Height Indicator
description: Use custom icons to show whether an NPC is above or below the player (texture path : Data/Textures/Interface/HUD/glow_hud_tick_mark_above.dds and '/glow_hud_tick_mark_below.dds').

subsettings.name: Height threshold
subsettings.description: Distance above/below the player before the custom icons are used.

name: Compass Quest Height Indicator
description: Use custom icons to show whether a quest marker is above or below the player.

name: Compass NPC Distance Based Alpha
description: Fade the compass NPC pips based on distance to the player, uses game-settings fSneakMaxDistance and fSneakExteriorDistanceMult.

name: Compass Location Distance Based Alpha
description: Fade the compass location markers based on distance to the player.

name: Compass Disable Edge Fade
description: Disable the alpha effect given to icons on the right edge of compass.

name: No Skill Books If Skill Maxed
description: Prevents consumption of books if skill level is already at 100.

name: No Min Companion Map Distance
description: Removes minimum distance companions are shown on the world map.

name: Map Show Unconscious Companions
description: Show unconscious companions on the map, in red.

name: Compass Custom Companion Color
description: Customize the color of companions on the compass.

subsettings.name: RGB color
subsettings.description: The red/green/blue value of the color in hexadecimal.

name: Disable Show Quest Location
description: Disables the functionality of the 'Show Location' button on the quest menu.

name: Prevent Fast Travel
description: Disables fast travel.

name: Remember Bobby Pin Health
description: Remembers the bobby pin health between locks (works through saves).

name: No Equipped Weapon Movement Penalty
description: Removes the movement penalty when holding a weapon.

name: Remove Weapon Damage Buffer
description: Removes the damage buffer provided for weapons above 75% condition.

name: Keep Crosshair When Aiming
description: Keep the cross-hair on the screen when aiming with non-scoped weapons.

name: Repeat Jumping
description: Holding the jump button repeatedly jumps.

name: Remove Sneak Label
description: Removes the [HIDDEN] etc. label from the HUD.

name: Tab Closes Terminals
description: Adds a hotkey Tab to close terminals.

name: Tab Back In Start Menu
description: Adds a hotkey Tab to go back in the start/pause menu.

name: Continue Game Hotkey
description: Adds a debug hotkey to continue the game from the loading/start menu for mod development ONLY (since if you press the hotkey too early, mods that utilize JIP's MenuMode 4 will not get a chance to run).

name: Level Up Scroll Wheel Support
description: Adds scroll-wheel support for the -+ skills in the level up menu.

name: No LTRT On Pipboy
description: Use the PipBoy texture without LT and RT painted on when a controller is connected.

name: No Red Crosshair On Enemies
description: Stops the cross-hair turning red on enemies.

name: Allow Open Pipboy During Camera Shake
description: Allows opening of the PipBoy when the screen is shaking (will reset the screen shake).

name: Left/Right Movement Cancel Out
description: Makes holding left and right movement keys not move the player (vanilla would move the player left).

name: Fix Enhanced Camera Ground Sink Bug
description: Provides a workaround for a bug in the Enhanced Camera mod where the player would sink into the ground when changing from first to third person.

name: Talk While Sneaking If Shift Is Held
description: While sneaking, holding shift will talk to an NPC instead of pickpocketing them.

name: Power Attacks Cost AP
description: Adds an Action Points penalty for performing charged unarmed attacks.

subsettings.name: Base AP cost
subsettings.description: Base number of action points used.

subsettings.name: Weapon weight AP mult
subsettings.description: Extra action points per point of weight for the current weapon.

subsettings.name: Max AP cost
subsettings.description: Max AP cost for a charged attack.

subsettings.name: Prevent power attacks without enough AP
subsettings.description: Perform normal attacks when holding attack without enough AP.

name: Inventory Drop Item Hotkey
description: Adds a hot-key 'Q' to drop the currently selected item from the PipBoy menu.

name: Instant Continue Button
description: Skip the 'Continue from your last saved game?' prompt when clicking continue game in the main menu.

name: Custom Sniper Zoom Rate
description: Set how quickly scoped weapons zoom.

subsettings.name: FOV change rate
subsettings.description: Rate at which scoped weapons will zoom in, vanilla is 0.25, setting to 0 zooms instantly.

subsettings.name: Same rate to zoom out
subsettings.description: Make the setting also affect zooming out.

name: Distance Based Quest Marker Visibilty
description: Hide quest markers beyond a set distance.

subsettings.name: Maximum exterior distance
subsettings.description: Maximum exterior distance from which to show quest markers.

subsettings.name: Maximum interior distance
subsettings.description: Maximum interior distance from which to show quest markers.

name: Quick Use
description: Holding shift will equip/use the cross-hair item. Right clicking on a non-armor item will equip it. Useful for eating/drinking/consuming items without opening the PipBoy.

subsettings.name: Realtime quick use
subsettings.description: Holding shift will equip/use the cross-hair item during gameplay.

subsettings.name: Right click to equip in containers
subsettings.description: Right clicking an inventory item while in a container will equip the item (excludes armor).

subsettings.name: F to use in containers
subsettings.description: Adds a hotkey 'F' to use the selected item in a container (excludes armor).

subsettings.name: Work on books
subsettings.description: Allows quick use on books.

subsettings.name: Work on notes
subsettings.description: Show the Book Menu when quick-using notes (requires textures and XML from Book Menu Restored).

subsettings.name: Show item stats
subsettings.description: Show item stats e.g. DPS, DAM, DT and DR while shift is held.

subsettings.name: Show "Re-read" for read notes
subsettings.description: Show 'Re-read' on the prompt for notes that have already been read.

name: Decreased Dialogue/Start Click Delay
description: Halves the delay before you can click on a dialogue option when having a conversation (500ms->250ms).

name: Hide Unknown NPC Names
description: Hide NPC names on the prompt if they haven't spoken to the player.

subsettings.name: Show names on dead NPCs
subsettings.description: Show the name if the NPC is dead.

name: Scale All XP
description: Scale all earned XP.

subsettings.name: XP multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to earned XP, the result is rounded up.

subsettings.name: Prevent Rounding
subsettings.description: Don't ceil earned XP, store the fractional component in the cosave and add it whenever XP is earned.

name: Vats Exit Key
description: Adds hotkeys Tab and Right Click to end the VATS killcam.

subsettings.name: Instant end
subsettings.description: Instantly end VATS playback rather than waiting for the current action to end.

name: Don't Set Quest When Completing Objectives
description: Don't set the current quest when completing objectives without having a quest active.

name: No Exit Hacking
description: Don't allow exiting the hacking menu if an attempt has been made.

subsettings.name: Fail on early exit
subsettings.description: Lock out of the terminal if exiting after making an attempt.

name: Slots Auto Spin Hotkey
description: Holding W will continually spin the slot machine.

name: UK Keyboard Layout
description: Use the UK Keyboard layout for console and other menus.

name: Remove Quest Objective Added Text
description: Hides the text for added objectives from the main HUD.

subsettings.name: Hide completed objectives
subsettings.description: Hides the quest completed objective text.

name: Pick Locks Even With Key
description: Holding shift allows picking a lock/terminal even if you have the key/password.

subsettings.name: Hold shift to use key
subsettings.description: Make holding shift allow using the key to the lock/terminal.

name: Remember Console History
description: Stores/restores console history from ConsoleHistory.txt.

subsettings.name: Maximum size
subsettings.description: Max number of commands to store (default is 200).

name: Console History Ignores Duplicates
description: Prevents consecutive duplicate commands being added to the console's input history list.

name: No Quest Sound In Killcams
description: Stops the 'Quest Added' sound playing whenever a cinematic killcam is shown.

name: No Grab Owned Items
description: Disallows grabbing (Z key) of owned items.

name: Auto-Skip Main Menu Intro Slides
description: Automatically skips the main menu video once loading is finished.

name: First Person VATS
description: Forces VATS firing camera to play in first person.

name: Allow Unsafe Fast Travel
description: Allows fast-traveling from indoors (you must be careful not to travel out of scripted areas).

subsettings.name: Show restricted area warning
subsettings.description: Show a warning when travelling from restricted areas.

name: Remove Landing Anim
description: Stops the landing animation playing.

name: Hold Crouch To Sneak
description: Makes sneaking holdable rather than toggle-able.

name: Fast Travel Costs Special Nuka Bottles
description: Makes fast travel cost 1 Nuka-Cola Quantum, Quartz or Victory.

subsettings.name: Item Required Message
subsettings.description: Message shown when trying to fast travel without the required items.

subsettings.name: Item Removed Message
subsettings.description: Message shown when an item is removed upon fast travel.

subsettings.name: Item Editor ID
subsettings.description: Editor ID of the item or formlist (requires JohnnyGuitar NVSE) to remove an item from instead of nuka cola.

name: Disable Selling Items
description: Removes the ability to sell items in the barter menu.

name: Use Custom Barter Price Multipliers
description: Set custom buy/sell multipliers for each item type (applied before perk modifiers).

subsettings.name: Constant purified water price
subsettings.description: Do not scale price of purified water.

name: Dialogue Number Hotkeys
description: Adds hot-keys 0-9 to select dialogue options (recommended use with VUI+).

subsettings.name: Display in dialogue topic
subsettings.description: Display list numbers for topics in dialogue.

subsettings.name: Tab chooses last option
subsettings.description: Add hotkey 'Tab' to choose the last option.

name: Disable Hit Shader
description: Disables the radial blur when damaged (optionally only when in god-mode).

name: Terminal Instant Display Hotkey
description: Adds hot-keys shift and right mouse button to instantly display the current terminal text, and left mouse to speed up display of submenus.

name: Keyboard Swap Y/Z Keys
description: Swap the Y and Z keys.

name: Reloading With Full Clip Switches Ammo Type
description: Reloading with a full clip switches ammo type.

name: Better Flycam
description: Adds AutoMove, flying up and down using Jump and Crouch, rotating pressing Z and C, and scrolling changes flight speed.

subsettings.name: Aim speed multiplier
subsettings.description: Speed multiplier while Aim is pressed.

subsettings.name: Run speed multiplier
subsettings.description: Speed multiplier while run is pressed.

subsettings.name: Scroll speed multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier for how much the mouse scroll-wheel influences fly speed.

subsettings.name: Rotation speed multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier for rotation speed.

subsettings.name: Smooth camera hotkey
subsettings.description: Adds a hotkey 'Reload' to enable a smooth/cinematic camera.

name: NPCs Drop Holstered Weapons
description: Allow enemies to drop weapons on death even if they are not out.

name: Prevent Reloading With Non-Empty Clip
description: Prevents reloading if the weapon's clip is not empty.

subsettings.name: Energy Weapons Only
subsettings.description: Only prevent reloading for energy weapons.

subsettings.name: Exclude Looping Reload Weapons
subsettings.description: Allow reloading weapons if they use a looping (bullet at a time) reload.

name: Hide Grenade Indicator
description: Removes the grenade indicator from the HUD.

name: Weightless Worn Power Armor
description: Scale the weight of equipped power armor.

subsettings.name: Require torso armor for weightless helmet
subsettings.description: Make power armor helmets only weightless if torso power armor is also equipped.

subsettings.name: Require Power Armor Training
subsettings.description: Only make power armor weightless for the player/teammates if they have the Power Armor Training perk.

subsettings.name: Weight Mult
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to worn armor weight.

name: Shift Screenshot Hides Menus
description: Holding shift when taking a screen-shot hides the menus.

name: Fast Travel With Enemies Nearby
description: Allows fast travel while enemies are nearby.

name: Fast Travel While Overencumbered
description: Allow fast travel when over-encumbered, as the Long Haul perk does.

name: No Knockdown In Godmode
description: Disables the player being knocked down when in god-mode, may break scripted sequences.

name: Double Tap Reload To Change Ammo Type
description: Double tapping the reload key will change ammo types.

subsettings.name: Allow multiple quick changes
subsettings.description: Pressing Reload additional times will keep swapping the ammo type.

subsettings.name: Ammo swap time
subsettings.description: Time in milliseconds that the Reload key must be pressed within to swap ammo types.

name: Force Lockpick No Break Lock
description: Failing a lock-pick force attempt breaks a bobby pin instead of the lock.

subsettings.name: Force fail resets pin health
subsettings.description: Reset the current bobby pin health when failing to force a lock.

subsettings.name: No lockpicking without bobby pins
subsettings.description: Prevents the LockPick Menu opening when the player has no bobby pins.

subsettings.name: Bobby Pin Break Message
subsettings.description: Corner message shown when the bobby pin breaks.

name: Custom Controller Deadzones
description:
Set a custom dead-zones for controller thumb-sticks, allowing finer movement and aiming. Default value 0 removes the deadzone entirely.
Recommend pairing with bMoreResponsiveControllerAiming.

subsettings.name: Deadzone
subsettings.description: Deadzone value (between 0 and 32767).

name: Faster Controller POV Rotate
description: Increases the controller rotation speed when POV is held to half of sensitivity.

name: Hide Cursor In Dialogue
description: Hide cursor while in Dialogue menus.

subsettings.name: Only when NPC speaks
subsettings.description: Only hide the cursor while the NPC is talking.

name: Faster Main Menu
description: Remove the wait for the Fallout New Vegas logo to be at full alpha.

subsettings.name: Skip wait for main menu slide
subsettings.description: Skip the 0-3s wait for the current load screen to fade out.

name: VATS Shift Ignores Friendly Targets
description: Holding shift ignores friendly NPCs when entering VATS.

subsettings.name: Ignore enemies instead
subsettings.description: Inverts mod behavior so holding shift SHOWS friendly NPCs.

name: Disable Explosion In Face IMOD
description: Disables the radial blur when an explosion occurs nearby.

name: Modify Skill Points Earned
description: Modifies skill points earned on level-up. The formula is : iSkillPointBase + ceil(Intelligence * fPointsPerInt).

subsettings.name: Skill Point Base
subsettings.description: Base skill points before Intelligence bonus is added.

subsettings.name: Points Per Intelligence
subsettings.description: Skill points earned per point of intelligence.

name: Luck Doesn't Affect Gambling
description: Removes the luck skill's effect on gambling by initializing the Gambling Menus with a luck of 5.

name: Remove Chem Worn Off IMOD
description: Removes the chem worn off screen effect.

name: Adjustable Scope Zoom
description: Allows scroll-wheel to zoom while using a scope.

subsettings.name: Zoom Rate
subsettings.description: Rate at which weapons are zoomed.

subsettings.name: Shift Zoom Scale
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to zoom rate while shift is held.

subsettings.name: Reset Zoom On Weapon Change
subsettings.description: Resets the current zoom when changing weapons.

subsettings.name: Smooth Scroll Zoom
subsettings.description: Apply smoothing to the change in zoom.

subsettings.name: Binoculars Only
subsettings.description: Only allow zooming on weapons with no projectile (e.g. binoculars).

subsettings.name: Scope Reset Time MS
subsettings.description: Resets the current zoom if unscoped for this long, set to 0 to disable.

subsettings.name: Min FOV
subsettings.description: Minimum scope FOV (max zoom).

subsettings.name: Max FOV
subsettings.description: Maximum scope FOV (minimum zoom).

subsettings.name: Min FOV Multiplier
subsettings.description: Minimum multiplier applied to weapon FOV (max-zoom).

subsettings.name: Max FOV Multiplier
subsettings.description: Maximum multiplier applied to weapon FOV (min-zoom).

subsettings.name: Zoom In Key
subsettings.description: Key to zoom in (can also use scrollwheel).

subsettings.name: Zoom Out Key
subsettings.description: Key to zoom out (can also use scrollwheel).

name: Popup Menus Don't Move Cursor
description: Prevents pop-up menus moving the mouse to the center of the screen.

name: Toggle Scope Night Vision
description: Pressing the iTogglePipboyLight key while aiming with a night vision weapon toggles off the night vision effect.

subsettings.name: Disable By Default
subsettings.description: Disables night vision for weapons until the toggle key has been pressed.

subsettings.name: Allow During Daytime
subsettings.description: Allow night vision during daytime.

subsettings.name: Toggle On Sound
subsettings.description: Sound to play when enabling night vision.

subsettings.name: Toggle Off Sound
subsettings.description: Sound to play when disabling night vision.

name: Scope Hold Breath
description: Holding shift decreases scope wobble at the cost of Action Points.

subsettings.name: AP Drain
subsettings.description: AP cost per interval.

subsettings.name: AP Drain Interval
subsettings.description: Interval length in milliseconds (lose AP every X milliseconds).

subsettings.name: Wobble Multiplier
subsettings.description: Wobble multiplier while breath is held.

subsettings.name: Require Weapon Strength
subsettings.description: Only allow holding breath if you have the required weapon strength.

subsettings.name: Require Weapon Skill
subsettings.description: Only allow holding breath if you have the required weapon skill.

subsettings.name: Hold Breath Key
subsettings.description: Scancode of keyboard key to hold breath.

name: Power Armor Scales Fall Damage
description: Wearing power armor scales fall damage.

subsettings.name: Fall Damage Multiplier
subsettings.description: Fall damage multiplier.

name: Agility Scales Movement Speed
description: Agility is scaled by fAgilityMovementSpeedMult for every point above or below 5, the latter slowing down the player. The formula is: speedMult = normalSpeedMult * (1 + (agility - 5) * fAgilityMovementSpeedMult).

subsettings.name: Agility Movement Speed Multiplier
subsettings.description: Additional movement multiplier per agility point above 5. Agility below 5 is scaled down.

subsettings.name: Affect NPCs
subsettings.description: Scale NPC movement speeds.

subsettings.name: Affect Player
subsettings.description: Scale player movement speeds.

name: Disable Weapon Zoom
description: Disables zooming when aiming with non-scoped weapons.

subsettings.name: Exclude Non-Sighted Weapons
subsettings.description: Only disable the zoom for weapons that have ironsights.

name: Disable Holstered Weapon FOV Zoom
description: Disables zooming when aiming with a weapon holstered.

name: No Capitalise Container Categories
description: Stops the container category titles being capitalized (you will need to change the AMMO title game-setting since it's capitalized in the actual setting, unlike Aid, Weapons and Armor).

name: Automatically Unequip Broken Armor
description: Automatically unequip armor when it breaks.

subsettings.name: Armor Break Message
subsettings.description: UI corner message shown when armor breaks.

name: Weapon Requirements Matter
description: Don't allow equipping of weapons without the required strength and skill.

subsettings.name: Ignore Strength Requirement
subsettings.description: Ignore strength requirement for all weapons.

subsettings.name: Ignore Non-Heavy Strength Requirement
subsettings.description: Ignore strength requirement for weapons that aren't of type 'Two Hand Launcher' or Two Hand Handle'.

subsettings.name: Ignore Skill Requirement
subsettings.description: Ignore skill requirement for all weapons.

subsettings.name: Ignore Throwables
subsettings.description: Ignore requirements for grenades, mines and throwable weapons.

name: Sneak Attack Without Crouching
description: Allow sneak attacks while standing.

name: Hide Loading Screen Tips
description: Removes the tips from loading screens.

name: Disable Companion Killcam
description: Prevents the killcam being activated by companion kills.

name: Pause Game After Loading A Save
description: Automatically pause the game when loading a save.

name: Remove Interior Fog
description: Removes non-static fog from interiors. Recommend using with Simple Interior Lighting Overhaul.

subsettings.name: Min Distance
subsettings.description: Distance over which far fog is removed - setting too low will cause visual bugs in some caves.

name: Improved Hacking
description: Improves various aspects of the hacking mini-game.

subsettings.name: Prevent Single Character Guesses
subsettings.description: Prevents single character attempts while hacking, i.e. clicking on '/' will do nothing rather than waste an attempt and clutter the guesses output.

subsettings.name: Remove Dud If Allowance Full
subsettings.description: Remove a dud instead of replenishing allowance if allowance is already full.

subsettings.name: Prevent Duplicate Guesses
subsettings.description: Prevent attempts at guessing the same word.

subsettings.name: No Special Input Prints
subsettings.description: Don't print the clicked on string with the 'Dud Removed' and 'Allowance replenished.' messages, to ensure less screen space is used.

subsettings.name: Remove Dud Ignores Guessed Words
subsettings.description: Make 'Dud removed.' ignore guessed words (unless they're the only words left).

subsettings.name: Print Guesses On A Single Line
subsettings.description: Prints guesses as a single line without the 'Entry denied', e.g. HORIZON (1/7).

subsettings.name: Overscroll Support
subsettings.description: Make scrolling to the edge of the screen wrap around to the other side (controller or WASD).

subsettings.name: Mark Guesses as Duds
subsettings.description: Turn incorrect guesses into .....

subsettings.name: Allowance Replenished Bonus
subsettings.description: Give a bonus number of attempts when finding a 'Replenish Allowanced' instead of setting attempts to the max (e.g. 4 in vanilla).

name: Lock Needs Key Show Name
description: Adds the name of the required key to the end of the sImpossibleLock message. Note: some keys are just named 'Key' in the base game - see https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/Fallout:_New_Vegas_keys

name: HUD Visible While Scoped
description: Adjust visibility of HUD elements while scoped, e.g. show HP/AP.

subsettings.name: Visibility Flags
subsettings.description: Hexadecimal value containing all the sum of all the desired flags. e.g. 0x00000001 would just be ActionPoints visible; 0x00000003 is HitPoints and ActionPoints; 0x000011A0 would be XpMeter, Messages, SneakMeter and RegionLocation visible. See the readme for available flags.

name: Delay Post Combat Level Up
description: Adds a 3s delay after combat before the LevelUp menu will show.

name: Jumping Doesn't Drop Grabbed Item
description: Stops the grabbed item being dropped when jumping.

name: No Map Marker Added Popup
description: Disables the Map Marker Added popup.

name: Godmode Prevents Leg Cripple Sound
description: Prevents the leg crippled sound in godmode.

name: Non Selectable Player In Console
description: Prevents the player being selected when clicking in console.

name: Extra Console Details (enabled by default)
description: Adds extra information when a ref is selected in the console.

subsettings.name: Show Full Help
subsettings.description: Show the extra details from the ToggleFullHelp command (attached scripts etc.).

subsettings.name: Show Cell Name
subsettings.description: Show the current player cell name at the top left of the console.

subsettings.name: Show Cell EditorID
subsettings.description: Show the editor ID of the current player cell at the top left of the console.

subsettings.name: Show Selected Mesh Path
subsettings.description: Show the mesh path of the selected ref (paths for missing meshes are always shown).

name: Print Errors To Console
description: Print vanilla debug errors to console.

subsettings.name: Print General Errors
subsettings.description: Print general errors.

subsettings.name: Print Havok Errors
subsettings.description: Print errors from the game's physics/mesh system.

subsettings.name: Print Havok Old hkpBody Errors
subsettings.description: Print useless 'old hlkpRigidBody' warnings from the game's physics/mesh system.

subsettings.name: Print Save/Load Errors
subsettings.description: Print errors related to saving/loading.

subsettings.name: Print General Messages
subsettings.description: Print various general debug information messages.

name: Hide Misc Quest Items
description: Hide quest items in the misc PipBoy page.

subsettings.name: Show Sunset Sarsaparilla Star Caps
subsettings.description: Don't Hide Sunset Sarsaparilla Star Caps.

name: Pickpocket Overhaul
description: Alters the pickpocket formula to take into account item weight, target perception and detection value. Note: the game-settings fPickpocketMaxChance and fPickPocketMinChance are still applied.

subsettings.name: Reward XP
subsettings.description:
Gain XP from successful pickpocketing.
XPReward = itemWeight * fItemWeightMult + (itemValue * fItemValueMult) + targetPerception

subsettings.name: Show success chance
subsettings.description: Add the pickpocket success chance to the bottom of the container menu.

subsettings.name: Success Percentage Message
subsettings.description: Message shown at the bottom of the container menu containing success percentage.

subsettings.name: Reverse pickpocket karma penalty live grenades only
subsettings.description: Only lose karma when reverse pickpocketing if it's a live explosive.

subsettings.name: No karma loss when stealing from hostile NPCs
subsettings.description: Only lose karma when pickpocketing from non-hostile NPCs.

subsettings.name: Base Chance
subsettings.description: PickPocketChance = fBaseChance + (playerAgility * fPlayerAgilityMult) + (playerLuck * fPlayerLuckMult) + (playerSneak * fPlayerSneakMult) - (targetPerception * fTargetPerceptionMult) - (detectionValue * fDetectionValueMult) - (itemValue * fItemValueMult) - (itemWeight * fItemWeightMult))

subsettings.name: Worn Item Mult
subsettings.description: If the item is worn by the NPC, the total chance is multiplied by fWornItemChanceMult.

name: Repairs Reward XP
description: Earn XP when repairing items.

subsettings.name: XP rewarded
subsettings.description: XP rewarded per item.

name: Kills Reward AP
description: Earn Action Points when killing outside of VATS.

subsettings.name: AP rewarded
subsettings.description: AP rewarded per kill.

name: No HUD Hotkey Popup
description: Prevent the hotkey wheel showing when holding a hotkey.

name: Clip Size Matters
description: Prevent firing if you don't have enough ammo for one burst.

name: HUD Shows Location Names
description: Show interior cell names in the HUD region text where the 'Mojave Wasteland' text is.

subsettings.name: Show nearby map markers
subsettings.description: Show the name of map markers when approaching them.

name: No Companion Kill XP
description: Don't reward XP for companion kills - stops companion's attack damage increasing the 'player dealt damage' used when comparing for iXPDeathRewardHealthThreshold.

subsettings.name: Companion hits count after player damage
subsettings.description: Companion hits count towards the iXPDeathRewardHealthThreshold after the player has hit the NPC.

name: Hide Ammo Label
description: Hide the clip/remaining label from the main HUD.

subsettings.name: Show total remaining
subsettings.description: Show the total ammo count instead of clip/remaining.

name: Scale AP Regen While Overencumbered
description: Scales AP regeneration while over-encumbered.

subsettings.name: AP regen scale
subsettings.description: Scale applied to the Action Points regen rate while over-encumbered.

subsettings.name: Apply only while moving
subsettings.description: Only apply the scale while the player is moving.

name: Disable Character Respec
description: Disable the character recreation script that runs when leaving the spawn area.

name: No Reputation Messages
description: Disables the reputation pop-ups and messages.

subsettings.name: Hide pop-ups
subsettings.description: Prevent the pop-up menus that require being click out of (e.g. Vilified).

subsettings.name: Hide corner gain messages
subsettings.description: Prevent the top left corner messages when gaining reputation.

subsettings.name: Hide corner loss messages
subsettings.description: Prevent the top left corner messages when losing reputation.

subsettings.name: Only hide non-scripted losses if at minimum reputation
subsettings.description: Prevent loss pop-up and message only if already at the min reputation and if the change was not from a script command.

subsettings.name: Only hide non-scripted gains if at maximum reputation
subsettings.description: Prevent gain pop-up and message only if already at the max reputation and if the change was not from a script command.

name: Inventory Sort Button
description: Add a button to sort/filter the inventory, specified by menus/prefabs/lStewieAl/SortInventoryButton.xml. Use Shift/Control click to cycle through filtering modes.

subsettings.name: Add to barter
subsettings.description: Add the button to the Barter menu.

subsettings.name: Add to containers
subsettings.description: Add the button to the Container menu.

subsettings.name: Add to Pip-Boy
subsettings.description: Add the button to the Inventory menu.

subsettings.name: Default sorting mode
subsettings.description: Default sorting/filtering mode for the button.

options.name: Hide by Weight
options.description: Hide items weighing less than a threshold weight.

options.name: Sort by Weight
options.description: Sort items by their weight (ignoring stack size).

options.name: Hide Quest Items
options.description: Sort items by their weight (ignoring stack size).

options.name: Hide by Weight and Quest Items
Hide by Weight and Quest Items and Sort By Weight

subsettings.name: Weight threshold for hiding
subsettings.description: Threshold weight for hiding items in Hide By Weight modes.

subsettings.name: Hide mode flags
subsettings.description: Hexadecimal value containing the sum of all the desired flags (see readme). e.g. 0x282 would prevent Show Radiation Decreasing Items, Show Food Items and Sort By Weight.

subsettings.name: Brighten active button
subsettings.description: Brighten the sort button while sorting/filtering is active instead of using a separate icon for inactive sorting.

subsettings.name: Controller toggle button
subsettings.description: Controller button to toggle sorting.

subsettings.name: Controller cycle button
subsettings.description: Button to cycle through sorting modes.

name: Clicking Active Tab Toggles Sorting
description: Clicking on the current PipBoy inventory tab toggles sorting/filtering.

name: Allow Rebind Numkeys
description: Show the number hotkeys in the Controls menu and allow binding controls to the DPAD (note it will conflict with any bound weapon hotkeys). Note Darnified UI does not support additional items in this menu due to a bug.

name: Disable Weapon Hotkeys
description: Ignore the DPAD and 1-9 weapon keys outside the pipboy.

name: Disable HUD Crippled Limb Indicator
description: Prevents the vaultboy showing on the HUD when a limb is crippled (not the 'LMB' text).

name: Console Background
description: Adds a background to the console, specified by menus/prefabs/lStewieAl/ConsoleBackground.xml.

name: Individual Item Stats
description: Show weight and value for a single item when viewing stacks of items, instead of the entire stack's weight/value.

name: Only Allow Waiting While Sitting
description: Only allow waiting while the player is sat down or in godmode.

subsettings.name: Show prevention message
subsettings.description: Show a message when waiting is prevented.

subsettings.name: Show prevention message
subsettings.description: Show a message with the current time when waiting is prevented, ignored when using the 'Show prevention message' option.

name: HUD RGB Sliders
description: Add RGB sliders for the main HUD color to the settings menu. Note Darnified UI does not support additional items in this menu due to a bug. Optionally make terminals use HUD color.

subsettings.name: Terminals use HUD color
subsettings.description: Make terminals copy the HUD color.

name: Show Currencies In Containers
description: Show faction currencies in the misc page for containers, and show Caps in the PipBoy misc tab.

name: Hide Grenade Indicator For No Damage Explosions
description: Hide the grenade indicator for projectiles whose explosions do no damage.

name: Unspoken NPC Indicator
description: Add a * to the prompt for NPCs who haven't been spoken to.

name: No Scale NPC Damage Threshold By Condition
description: Don't scale NPC armor damage threshold based on condition.

name: No Scale NPC Damage Resistance By Condition
description: Don't scale NPC armor damage resistance based on condition.

name: No Scale NPC Damage By Condition
description: Don't scale damage by NPCs based on their weapon condition.

name: Sort Unavailable Radios To Bottom
description: Fix a vanilla bug where unavailable radios aren't sorted to the bottom of the list.

name: Prevent Generic Follower Topics
description: Prevents companions saying when they are injured, needing ammo, weapons etc.

name: Disable Tutorial Messages
description: Disables hard-coded one-time tutorial menu messages, e.g. hacking, lockpick, PipBoy. Does not disable non-hardcoded messages such as 'Press V to use VATS' etc.

name: Barter Check Actor Buy Sell Flags
description: Make vendors obey their Buy/Sell flags, hiding items the vendor doesn't accept.

subsettings.name: Ammo Requires Weapons
subsettings.description: Only buy/sell ammo if vendor buys/sells weapons.

name: Keep Selected Console Ref
description: Remembers the selected ref when closing the console (provided it is still loaded).

name: No Fast Travel Time Change
description: Don't progress time or hardcore needs when fast traveling.

name: Sleep In Owned Beds
description: Allow sleeping in owned beds.

name: Detected By Whom
description: Show the names of actors detecting you while sneaking, e.g. Replaces [DETECTED] with [Detected by: Easy Pete, Sunny Smiles, and 2 others]

subsettings.name: Maximum name count
subsettings.description: Names to display before showing "and N others".

subsettings.name: Detected String
subsettings.description: Starting string for list ([Detected by: )

subsettings.name: Actors String
subsettings.description: String shown when the max name count is 0.

subsettings.name: Others String
subsettings.description: String shown when more than iMaxNameCount actors are detecting the player.

subsettings.name: Plural String
subsettings.description: Appended to 'and %d other(s)'.

name: Running Costs AP
description: Adds an Action Points cost for running.

subsettings.name: Base AP cost
subsettings.description: Base action points cost.

subsettings.name: AP cost endurance mult
subsettings.description: Endurance multiplier for AP cost.

subsettings.name: AP drain interval
subsettings.description: Time between AP reductions (in milliseconds).

subsettings.name: Allow running without enough AP
subsettings.description: Always allows running, preventing AP gain when at 0.

subsettings.name: In combat only
subsettings.description: Only decrease action points when running while in combat.

subsettings.name: AP regeneration mult
subsettings.description: Action point regen multiplier while moving.

name: Hide Completed Quests
description: Don't display completed quests in the PipBoy Quests tab.

name: Hold Wait Key To Show Menu
description: Makes the sleep/wait button require to be held instead of instantly showing when pressed.

subsettings.name: Key hold time
subsettings.description: Time the wait key must be held before the wait menu is shown (in milliseconds).

name: Use Fallout 3 Audio Distortion
description: Use a distortion algorithm similar to the one in Fallout 3 for NPCs wearing masks (sounds more metallic and less muffled).

name: Keep XP Bar When Closing Menus
description: Stops the XP bar being hidden when closing a menu (e.g. Hacking, Dialogue or Lockpicking).

name: Pick Locks Without Skill
description: Allow picking locks of any level.

subsettings.name: Scale difficulty
subsettings.description:
Scale the difficulty of locks based on your skill deficit.
Formula: sweetSpot = vanillaSweetSpot * (skillLevel / skillReq)

name: Hack Terminals Without Skill
description: Allow hacking terminals of any level.

name: Turn Further While Seated
description: Increase the maximum rotation while seated to -115 <-> 115 degrees (from vanilla -90 <-> 90) in first person, and full 360 degrees in third person.

name: Loot Unconscious Victims
description: Allows unconscious actors to be looted.

name: Color Recently Added Map Markers
description: Show map markers added this session in red. Map markers given to you are displayed in red until the save is reloaded.

name: Custom Default Pipboy Tab
description: Makes the PipBoy always open to the same tab when the MenuMode key is pressed (F1/F2/F3 still navigate to their respective categories).

name: Show Weapon Ammo Use In Menus
description: Show the ammo used per shot when viewing a weapon in the inventory. e.g. when viewing a Tri-Beam Laser Rifle, the ammo display will be 'MF Cell x 3'.

name: No Place Marker Popup
description: Don't show the Place/Remove marker when placing markers on the map.

subsettings.name: Shift+click to remove
subsettings.description: Makes right clicking always place the map marker (instead of toggling it being placed/removed). If shift is held while clicking, the marker will be removed.

name: 24-Hour Sleep Wait Clock
description: Changes the sleep/wait clock to be in 24 hour format.

name: 12-Hour Pipboy Clock
description: Changes the PipBoy clock to be in 12 hour format.

name: Respawning Container Indicator
description: Adds a warning in the subtitles bar if the opened container is set to respawn.

subsettings.name: Warning message
subsettings.description: Warning message shown on containers that respawn.

name: Local Map Respawned Cell Indicator
description: Show respawned cells as red, and unvisited cells as white on the local map.

subsettings.name: Show respawned cells
subsettings.description: Color respawned cells in red.

subsettings.name: Show unvisited cells
subsettings.description: Color unvisited cells in white.

name: Better Pickup Prompt
description: Show the value and weight for a whole stack of items while looting and indicate the weight in red if it would overencumber you.

name: Hide Equipped Items In Barter
description: Hides equipped items in the barter menu.

name: Hide Equipped Items In Containers
description: Hides equipped items in the containers.

name: No Food Worn Off Message
description: Prevents the 'worn off' message for food items.

name: Keep Quest Text Visible While Aiming
description: Stops the quest/location texts being hidden when aiming.

name: Allow Teammates Use Meltdown
description: Allow teammates to use the meltdown effect if the player has the Meltdown perk.

name: No Self Explosion Damage
description: Prevents damage from your own explosions (NPCs can still harm themselves).

name: Hold To Activate
description: Hold the activate key instead of pressing it to activate various objects.

subsettings.name: Work on containers and NPCs
subsettings.description: Hold activate to loot containers or search NPCs.

subsettings.name: Work on furniture
subsettings.description: Hold activate to interact with furniture (including beds).

subsettings.name: Work on water
subsettings.description: Hold activate to drink from a tap or puddle.

subsettings.name: Work on crafting tables
subsettings.description: Hold activate to interact with campfire, crafting and reloading benches.

subsettings.name: Take items while held
subsettings.description: Takes items while the activate key is held (doesn't activate containers, NPCs etc.).

subsettings.name: Item pick up delay
subsettings.description: Delay before items will be taken with "Take items while held" active.

subsettings.name: Don't over-encumber
subsettings.description: Prevent auto-pickup of items that would encumber the player, unless the player is already encumbered.

subsettings.name: Delay stealing
subsettings.description: Delay stealing the first item by 'Steal Delay Timer'.

name: No Weapon Condition Damage Penalty
