name: Player Melee Damage Ignores Scale
description: Makes the player's melee damage independent of their height/scale.

name: Hide Map Marker Faction Reputation
description: Hide the faction reputation from map markers on the world map.

name: Compare Weapon Stats
description: Show - and + on weapon DPS/DAM relative to the equipped weapon.

name: Sleep Wait Anywhere
description: Allow sleeping/waiting anywhere.

subsettings.name: Sleep in combat
subsettings.description: Allow sleeping during combat.

subsettings.name: Sleep in radiation
subsettings.description: Allow sleeping while being irradiated.

subsettings.name: Sleep mid-air
subsettings.description: Allow sleeping mid-air.

subsettings.name: Sleep while taking damage
subsettings.description: Allow sleeping while taking damage.

subsettings.name: Sleep underwater
subsettings.description: Sleep with the fishes.

subsettings.name: Sleep while trespassing
subsettings.description: Allow sleeping while trespassing.

name: No Interior Black Loading Screen
description: Remove the black loading screen when loading an interior cell, and prevent actors being faded in.

subsettings.name: Fade in
subsettings.description: Fade the edges of the screen based on the fFadeToBlackFadeSeconds game-setting.

name: Character Melee Damage Ignores Scale
description: Stops NPC and player scale affecting their melee damage.

name: Skip Skill Menu If No Points To Assign
description: Skip the assign skill points screen if you have no points to assign but have perks to assign.

name: Custom Armor Condition Penalty
description: Allow a custom scale applied to armor DR/DT based on their condition.

subsettings.name: DR/DT Scale
subsettings.description: Scale applied to DR/DT when below the condition threshold.

name: Hitting Weapons Doesn't Damage Them
description: Prevents player and enemy weapons being damaged when shot at.

name: No Exterior Load Screens
description: Removes load screen backgrounds when exiting interiors (intentionally excludes when loading a save).

name: Ultrawide Support
description: For ultrawide (21:9) fixes the bugs: - The size of the 'Fade-to-black' transition now takes up the entire screen instead of a small rectangle (as seen when loading a save or transitioning between areas). -Adjusts the FOV for various rendered menus such as the Vigor Tester, Terminal and LockPick menus, and the HUDMainMenu for scope zoom. This fixes the menus being too zoomed in.

subsettings.name: Menu FOV scale
subsettings.description: Scale applied to menus/scope. Vanilla uses 0.75.

name: Weightless Worn Armor
description: Scale the weight of equipped armor.

subsettings.name: Weight Mult
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to worn armor weight.

name: Character Non Melee Damage Ignores Scale
description: Stops NPC and player scale affecting their non-melee damage.

name: Player Non-Melee Damage Ignores Scale
description: Stops player scale affecting non-melee damage.

name: Weightless Aid Items In Non-Hardcore
description: Makes aid items weightless in non-hardcore.

name: Weightless Items
description: Makes items weightless (by category).

name: Hide Crosshair In First Person
description: Hides the crosshair in first person (keeping it in third person).

name: Hide Crosshair In Third Person
description: Hides the crosshair in third person (keeping it in first person).

name: No Casino Bans
description: Prevents bans from casinos.

name: No Sneak Attack Criticals
description: Disables sneak attack criticals by the player.

name: NPCs Can Sneak Crit Player
description: Allows NPCs to land sneak attack criticals on the player and on each other. - can be used alongside bNoSneakAttacksCriticals (making it 'No Player Sneak Attack Criticals').

name: NPCs Can Disarm Player
description: Allows NPCs to disarm the player.

name: Sneak Criticals Only Melee Weapons
description: Only allow sneak attack criticals with melee weapons.

name: Show Quest And No DRDT Items In Repair Menu
description: Unhide quest items and armors with no DR or DT from the repair services menu.

name: Disable Godmode On Load
description: Disables godmode when loading/reloading a save.

name: Invert Container Title Scrollwheel Direction
description: Inverts the direction of category change when using scroll-wheel on a container's title.

name: HUD Fatigue Indicator
description: Adds a fatigue indicator similar to the FOD and H2O labels in hardcore.

name: Allow Weapon Hotkeys And PipBoy While Reloading
description: Allows switching weapons using weapon hot-keys, and opening the PipBoy while reloading.

name: No Disarm Companions
description: Prevents companions from being disarmed in combat.

name: Allow Firing While Landing
description: Allows firing weapons while lower body animations are playing.

name: Fire While Aiming
description: Allows firing weapons while aiming in and out.

name: Dont Allow Console Till Loading Is Done
description: In vanilla it's possible to load a save using the console before settings (e.g. disable controller) have been loaded, this prevents opening the console till this loading has finished.

name: Power Attack While Overencumbered
description: Allow melee power attacks while overencumbered.

name: Slow Breath Regen
description: Slowly regenerate the H2O meter when not underwater instead of instantly refilling it when resurfacing.

subsettings.name: Breath regen rate
subsettings.description: Rate at which breath is restored to max - setting to 1.0 restores the entire bar in 1 second, 0.5 in 2 seconds etc.

subsettings.name: Show breath regen while not underwater
subsettings.description: Show the breath meter when not underwater if it's not 100%.

name: Note Menu Show Separate Menu
description: Show the scroll menu when clicking on a note in the PipBoy (requires textures and XML from Book Menu Restored).

subsettings.name: Require holding Shift
subsettings.description: Require the shift key to be held to show the note menu.

name: Don't Set Quest When Objectives Added
description: Don't set the current quest when gaining a new objective when you have no quest active.

name: Spin Weapons Sound Fix
description: Fixes a bug where looping attack weapons would not play their attack sound when briefly stopped. For example in the base game, tapping and then holding the fire button with the Flamer or Mini-gun held would result in no fire sound playing.

name: Turn Slower While Aiming
description: Scale look rotation speed while aiming.

subsettings.name: X scale
subsettings.description: Scale applied to X axis rotation while aiming.

subsettings.name: Y scale
subsettings.description: Scale applied to Y axis rotation while aiming.

name: Show Sneak Label While Standing
description: Show the [Sneak] indicator while standing.

name: VATS Auto Target Head
description: Automatically target the head when entering VATS.

name: Only Change Camera Height If POV Key Held
description: Scrolling only changes camera height if the 'Change View' key is held.

name: Compare Armor Stats
description: Show - and + on armor DT and DR relative to the equipped armors.

name: Allow VATS While Anims Play
description: Allow entering VATS while animations play (e.g. while jumping).

name: Robot Companions Heal With Scrap Metal
description: Heal robotic companions with scrap metal instead of stimpaks.

subsettings.name: Base health restored
subsettings.description: Base health restored per scrap metal.

subsettings.name: Repair skill bonus
subsettings.description: Bonus health restored per player repair skill.

subsettings.name: Robotics Expert bonus
subsettings.description: Bonus health restored if the player has the robotics expert perk.

name: Custom Screenshot Format
description: Automatically convert taken screenshots into various formats. Currently supported formats are: jpg, tiff and bmp.

subsettings.name: Format (JPG, PNG or BMP)
subsettings.description: File format (jpg, tiff, png or bmp).

name: Mod Console Prints Include Name
description: When a mod prints to the console, prepend the [Modname] to the text. Optionally print the formid of the script that printed it.

subsettings.name: Include script ID
subsettings.description: Prepend the script ID instead of the mod name.

name: Scale Radio Song Volume During Dialogue
description: Scale the volume of radio songs while in conversation with an NPC.

subsettings.name: Volume multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to music volume during dialogue.

name: Scale Music Volume During Dialogue
description: Scale the volume of ambient music while in conversation with an NPC.

subsettings.name: Volume multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to music volume during dialogue.

name: Use First Person Empty Clip Sound
description: Use the first person empty clip sound in third person (it's louder).

name: Menu Search
description: Add Control F to search various menus.

subsettings.name: Add to Map Menu
subsettings.description: Add to Map Menu (Local Map, World Map, Quests, Notes, Challenges and Radio).

subsettings.name: Add to Inventory Menu
subsettings.description: Add to Inventory Menu (Pip-Boy).

subsettings.name: Add to Stats Menu
subsettings.description: Add to Stats Menu (Effects, Skills, Perks, Reputations, Misc Stats).

subsettings.name: Add to Barter Menu
subsettings.description: Add to Barter Menu.

subsettings.name: Add to Container Menu
subsettings.description: Add to Container Menu.

subsettings.name: Add to Level Up Menu
subsettings.description: Add to Level Up Menu (perks).

subsettings.name: Add to Recipe Menu
subsettings.description: Add to Recipe Menu.

subsettings.name: Add to Save/Load Menu
subsettings.description: Add to Save/Load Menu.

subsettings.name: Remove filter when closing search
subsettings.description: Refresh the menu when closing the search (disable if you want to use keyboard hotkeys to navigate filtered menus).

subsettings.name: Clear input when reopening search
subsettings.description: Clear the input string when focusing the search-bar, forced to 1 if bRemoveFilterWhenClosingSearch is also 1.

subsettings.name: Quest search includes objectives
subsettings.description: Also search objective text when searching for quests.

subsettings.name: Quest search includes completed objectives
subsettings.description: Include completed objectives if "Quest search includes objectives" is enabled.

name: Allow Keyboard And Mouse With Controller Connected
description: Allow use of keyboard and mouse to move around (excludes menus) while a controller is connected.

name: Scale Critical Damage
description: Multiply critical damage for all weapons.

subsettings.name: Damage multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to weapon damage for critical hits.

name: Cookable Grenades
description: Holding grenades decreases their detonation timer.

subsettings.name: No grenade distance increase
subsettings.description: Always throw grenades the same distance regardless of time held.

subsettings.name: Overcooked grenades explode
subsettings.description: Overcooked grenades will explode in your hand.

subsettings.name: Minimum detonation time
subsettings.description: Minimum detonation time for thrown grenades.

subsettings.name: Play cooking sound
subsettings.description: Play a sound every second a grenade is held.

subsettings.name: Countdown timer
subsettings.description: Play the sound for the last 3 seconds of the timer.

subsettings.name: Sound ID
subsettings.description: Editor ID of the sound to play.

subsettings.name: Final second sound ID
subsettings.description: Editor ID of the sound to play for the final second when using countdown.

name: Use Console Output File
description: Automatically set the console output file.

subsettings.name: File name
subsettings.description: The name of the output file e.g. ConsoleOut.txt.

name: Cache Quest And Note Menu
description: Speed up the quest and note menus by only recreating them if your quest/notes state has changed, and not creating the challenges list if you're viewing the notes tab.

name: Keep Holotape Playing When Selecting Other Notes
description: Don't stop the current holotape's audio when clicking on other (non-audio) notes.

name: Smooth True Ironsights Camera
description: Smooth the ironsights animation by interpolating between the non-aiming and aiming camera positions.

subsettings.name: Aim transition time
subsettings.description: Time taken to transition between the camera positions (in milliseconds).

subsettings.name: Easing function
subsettings.description: Which easing function will be applied to the movement (see easings.net).

name: Disable Needs Messages
description: Prevents the messages when hardcore needs and radiation levels increase/decrease.

name: Crouch While Equipping Weapons
description: Allows crouching while (un)equipping weapons, the crouch animation is queued after the equip.

name: Recently Dead NPC Indicator
description: Shows recently killed NPCs on the compass until they have been moused over.

subsettings.name: Indicator time out
subsettings.description: Maximum time an NPC tick will be shown for after their death (in milliseconds, 0 is unlimited).

subsettings.name: Player and teammate kills only
subsettings.description: Only show NPCs killed by the player or companions.

subsettings.name: Player damaged only
subsettings.description: Only show NPCs damaged by the player.

subsettings.name: Color
subsettings.description: RGB color of indicators in hexadecimal.

name: Controller Back Button Doesn't Close PipBoy
description: Prevents the Back button closing the PipBoy.

name: Auto Weapon No Firing Delay
description: Allows firing automatic weapons even if they are animating already (e.g. miniguns spinning up).

subsettings.name: Include heavy weapons
subsettings.description: Ignore the need for heavy weapons (animation type >= 8) to spin up before firing.

name: Min Blood Splatter Health Damage
description: Only show blood splatters if their damage is above a minimum health damage threshold.

subsettings.name: Minimum health damage
subsettings.description: Minimum health damage of an attack for blood splatters to show.

name: VATS Stop Firing If Target Dead
description: Stop firing the current burst in VATS if the target is already dead, e.g. the 10mm SMG which fires 3 rounds in a burst in VATS.

name: Hold And Release Throwables
description: Allows hold/releasing for throwables similar to grenades.

subsettings.name: Support mines
subsettings.description: Allow holding mines before throwing them.

name: Allow Sleep Wait With Reduced Max Health
description: Allows sleep/waiting while max health is reduced by effects - making it possible to sleep with a temporary effect like -50hp, while still preventing sleeping while taking damage.

name: Level Difference Affects Combat XP
description: Makes kill XP depend on the level difference between the player and killed actor.

subsettings.name: Base XP reward
subsettings.description: Base XP rewarded for all kills.

subsettings.name: Level difference bonus
subsettings.description: Additional XP rewarded per point of level difference between player and killed actor.

name: Swap Ammo With Weapon Holstered
description: Allow swapping ammo types while weapon is holstered.

name: Power Armor Needs No Training
description: Allows wearing power armor without the Power Armor Training perk.

name: Colored HUD Bars
description: Colors the HP and AP bars red when they are low. Note that temporary effects that raise max HP will show the bar in red at a higher percentage, this is intended to indicate that your health will be low when the buff wears off.

subsettings.name: Red HP threshold
subsettings.description: Threshold ratio of current/max Health for coloring HP bar red.

subsettings.name: Red AP threshold
subsettings.description: Threshold ratio of current/max Action Points for coloring AP bar red.

name: Speed Mult Scales Jump Height
description: Scale NPC and player jump height based on their speedmult actor value.

name: Stealing Sends No Alarm
description: Don't alert actors when stealing their items (excludes pickpocketing).

name: Sneak Criticals Headshots Only
description: Only allow sneak attack criticals to the head.

name: Sort Pipboy Notes
description: Sort the PipBoy Notes tab alphabetically, and/or by whether they're read.

name: Sort Pipboy Quests
description: Sort the PipBoy Quests tab.

name: Disable Achievements
description: Disables steam/gog achievements.

name: Show Weapon Poison Effects
description: Include weapon poison effects when viewing weapons in the PipBoy.

name: Hide Unavailable Radios
description: Hide unavailable radios in the PipBoy.

name: Stats Menu Percentage XP
description: Show XP in the Stats Menu as a percentage.

name: Unequip Weapon Mods
description: Allow unequipping weapon mods from the Item/Weapon Mod Menu, additionally hiding duplicate mods and sorting them alphabetically.

subsettings.name: Hide button for non-modifiable weapons
subsettings.description: Hide the Mod button if a weapon cannot have weapon mods.

subsettings.name: Show unowned mods
subsettings.description: Show unowned weapon mods in the menu.

subsettings.name: Unequip mod sound ID
subsettings.description: Editor ID of the sound to play when removing weapon mods (note: VUI+ has its own sounds that it plays when you click on weapon mods).

subsettings.name: Require workbench
subsettings.description: Only allow weapon modding at a workbench.

subsettings.name: Debug mode
subsettings.description: Allow applying weapon mods even if you don't have them.

name: Difficulty Doesn't Affect NPC-NPC Damage
description: Stops NPC-NPC damage using the fDiffMultHPByPC gamesetting, with multipliers for NPC/teammate damages. Companion<->companion damage uses fDamageToTeammateMult.

subsettings.name: NPC-NPC damage multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to damage from one NPC to another.

subsettings.name: Teammate-NPC damage multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier for damage dealt by companions to NPCs.

subsettings.name: NPC-Teammate damage multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier for damage dealt to companions by NPCs.

name: Disable Combat Music
description: Prevents combat music playing.

name: Keep Broken Items Equipped
description: Prevent the message when a weapon breaks and keep it equipped.

name: Pickpocket Worn Items
description: Allow pickpocketing items NPCs have equipped.

name: Move During VATS Playback
description: Allow movement during VATS killcams.

name: Clicking Shows Terminal Text
description: Make clicking while a note is being displayed on a computer first show the rest of the page, or skip to the next page if the current page is fully displayed.

name: Invert Pipboy Repair Menu Sorting
description: Place high condition items at the bottom of the repair list.

name: Disable Region Borders Keep Message
description: Allow movement outside world borders, showing the 'Leaving Region' warning repeatedly. Functionally equivalent to adding bBorderRegionsEnabled = 0 under [General] in FalloutCustom.ini, but retains the ui warning.

name: No Recurring Challenges
description: Prevents 'recurring' challenges from resetting their progress when completed.

name: Recurring Challenge Indicator
description: Adds an indicator that a challenge is recurring when viewed in the PipBoy. '(Recurring)' appears beside the progress e.g. 4/10 (Recurring).

name: Custom Subtitle Distance
description: Modify how far away general subtitles are shown. For long distances you may need to increase the iSpeakSoundLipDistance gamesetting from its default of 750.

subsettings.name: Subtitle distance
subsettings.description: Distance to show subtitles from - vanilla is 500 units.

name: Scope Visibility Delay
description: Delay the display of scopes when aiming in, and optionally prevent scoped aiming while reloading.

subsettings.name: Scope visibility delay
subsettings.description: Required aiming time before the scope overlay is applied.

subsettings.name: Aim out while reloading
subsettings.description: Aim out while reloading or weapon is jamming.

subsettings.name: Always show weapon animation
subsettings.description: Forces the "uses 1st person iron sights anims" flag on all weapons.

subsettings.name: Delay in 3rd person
subsettings.description: Delay scopes in 3rd person.

name: No Healing In Combat
description: Prevent use of aid items that heal HP or limbs while in [Danger].

subsettings.name: Message
subsettings.description: Message shown when attempting to heal in combat.

name: Hide Ranks In Trait Menu
description: Hide 'Ranks' in the description for traits in the Trait menu, since it's a holdover from the LevelUp menu perk selection screen.

name: Sort Perk Menu
description: Sort the LevelUp Perk Menu.

name: Less Restrictive VATS Menu
description: Allow dequeuing actions and exiting vats while zooming in/out.

name: No Turning Anim
description: Suppress player turning animations to prevent the glide when stopping while turning.

name: Custom Add To Inventory Message Timer
description: Customize the length of time the 'Added to inventory' message is shown.

subsettings.name: "Item added" time
subsettings.description: Time the 'added to inventory' message is shown (in seconds).

name: Hide Red Crosshair On Distant Invisible Targets
description: Prevent the red crosshair when mousing over invisible enemies in the distance.

name: Ammo Count Memory
description: Remember ammo type and count (optional) for all player weapons. Data is stored in the vanilla save, and is removed if loading without the tweak active, or if the weapons are deleted/unloaded.

subsettings.name: Forget when transferred
subsettings.description: Forget stored ammo/type when weapons are dropped or transferred (to decrease save size).

subsettings.name: Remember ammo count
subsettings.description: Remember ammo count as well as type (regenerating ammo weapons always have their count stored).

name: Fatal Non Sneak Crits Always Gib
description: Make fatal non-sneak critical hits always explode or dismember limbs.

subsettings.name: Only criticals explode/dismember limbs
subsettings.description: Prevent non-critical hits exploding or dismembering limbs.

name: No Free Barter Items
description: Set a price for 'free' items (e.g. ammo casings), calculated after barter buy/sell multipliers.

subsettings.name: Free item cost
subsettings.description: Cost for buying items with no value.

name: Locational Melee Damage
description: Make melee and unarmed damage use limb damage multipliers.

subsettings.name: Apply to player-NPC attacks
subsettings.description: Use hit multiplier for attacks by the player.

subsettings.name: Apply to NPC-player attacks
subsettings.description: Use hit multiplier for attacks by NPCs on the player.

subsettings.name: Apply to NPC-NPC attacks
subsettings.description: Use hit multiplier for attacks on NPCs by NPCs.

name: Queue Weapon Holstering While Anims Play
description: Pressing holster weapon while animations play will holster when the anims finish, instead of doing nothing as in vanilla.

name: No Lock Failed Terminals
description: Don't lock terminals when they are failed.

name: Delay Post Combat Reputation Popup
description: Delay the reputation change popup dialog till 3 seconds after combat.

name: No Player Name Length Limit
description: Remove the limit on the number of characters in the player's name.

name: Skip Vigor Tester Special Pages
description: Skip to the vigor tester review page.

name: Grabbing Items Is Crime
description: Make grabbing owned items carry the same faction penalty as stealing.

name: Custom Special Points
description: Set a custom number of SPECIAL points to allocate, minimum is 7 (one in each skill).

subsettings.name: Number of points to allocate
subsettings.description: Total SPECIAL points after distributing points from the Vigor Tester or Special Book (TTW).

name: Allow Weapon Hotkeys While Firing
description: Allow using weapon hotkeys while firing.

name: Move During Open Pipboy Anim
description: Allow movement during the open PipBoy animation.

name: Hip Fire Anims While Scoped
description: Use non-ironsight anims and recoil patterns for scoped weapons to prevent weapons lingering in your face when un-scoping after firing. Note that this requires alternate animations as the hip fire recoil patterns for some weapons - e.g. the Scoped Varmint Rifle - look awful while scoped.

name: Restore '2' Hotkey
description: Restores the '2' weapon hotkey. Requires 'Data/menus/prefabs/lStewieAl/2Hotkey.xml'. Controller users will need to bind ammo swap some other way (e.g. using bDoubleTapReloadToChangeAmmoType).

subsettings.name: Second slot key
subsettings.description: Scancode of the keyboard hotkey.

subsettings.name: Show keybinds on labels
subsettings.description: Use the name of the bound hotkey on the wheel instead of 1/2/3...

name: Encumbrance Includes Grabbed Items
description: Include the weight of the grabbed ('Z' key) item stack weight when determining if player is overencumbered.

name: Use Anim Variants
description: Allow use of anim variants, similar to firing animation variants - requires both 1st and 3rd person animation files.

subsettings.name: Reload variants
subsettings.description: Allow reload variations.

subsettings.name: Equip/unequip variants
subsettings.description: Allow equip/unequip variations.

subsettings.name: Aim/ADS variants
subsettings.description: Allow aim/aimIS variations.

name: Custom Hacking Answer Length
description: Use a custom formula for hacking answer length.

subsettings.name: Base word length
subsettings.description: Base word length.

subsettings.name: Difficulty multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied on difficulty before adding to word length.

subsettings.name: Computer Whiz length bonus
subsettings.description: Characters removed from answer if you have the computer whiz perk.

subsettings.name: Odd ID bonus
subsettings.description: Characters added to answer if terminal ref ID is odd.

subsettings.name: Maximum word length
subsettings.description: Maximum answer length.

subsettings.name: Minimum word length
subsettings.description: Minimum answer length (minimum 2, note: there aren't many words in the hacking dictionary.txt file that are two characters long).

subsettings.name: Minimum guesses
subsettings.description: Minimum guesses.

subsettings.name: Maximum guesses
subsettings.description: Maximum guesses.

name: No Compass Pips If Not In Danger
description: Hide all NPCs on the compass if you aren't in [Danger].

name: Force Hi-Res Weapon Models
description: Use 1st person (high-res) models for NPCs' weapons.

name: Show Doors On Compass
description: Show nearby doors on the compass.

subsettings.name: Maximum exterior distance
subsettings.description: Maximum distance to show doors in exteriors.

subsettings.name: Maximum interior distance
subsettings.description: Maximum distance to show doors in interiors.

subsettings.name: Show visited cells
subsettings.description: Color the doors of visited cells (excludes doors leading to worldspaces).

subsettings.name: Fade icon with distance
subsettings.description: Scale the door icon's alpha based on distance to the player.

subsettings.name: Visited cell color
subsettings.description: Visited cell red/green/blue color in hexadecimal, e.g. 0xFF0088.

name: Critical-Hit Messages Include Limb Name
description: Include the limb name in critical hit messages. e.g. 'Critical strike on Easy Pete's Torso'.

name: Menu Fades Ignore Timescale
description: Make menu fading in/out ignore timescale.

name: Activating Doesn't Stand Up
description: Make activating while using furniture not stand up, instead use movement to stand while seated.

name: No Skill Message If Increase Is Zero
description: Prevent the 'skill increased by 0' if reading a book with no bonus. Additionally display fractional skill book increases to two decimal places.

name: Compass Fade Left Side
description: Fade icons for NPCs, doors etc. on the left side of the compass. Useful if using a centered compass.

name: Console Text Shadow
description: Darkens the console output text and adds a faint shadow for readability.

name: Minigames Play XP Sound At Max Level
description: Play the XP gained sound when hacking or lockpicking at max player level.

name: VATS Hip Fire
description: Entering VATS while not aiming will shoot from the hip for all shots fired (does not affect accuracy).

name: Alternate Levelup Sounds
description: Play an alternate level-up sound every A or B levels. If A is a multiple of B, the larger number wins ties.

subsettings.name: Sound A
subsettings.description: Editor ID of sound to play every 'Interval A' levels.

subsettings.name: Interval A
subsettings.description: Play 'Sound A' every N levels.

subsettings.name: Sound B
subsettings.description: Editor ID of sound to play every 'Interval B' levels.

subsettings.name: Interval B
subsettings.description: Play 'Sound B' every N levels.

name: Agility Affects Reload Jam Speed
description: Make reload jams affected by reload speed multipliers.

name: Run Slower In Water
description: Scale movement speed when walking/running through water depending on much you are immersed.

subsettings.name: Wading Movement Multiplier
subsettings.description: Max movement speed penalty when wading through water.

name: Pipboy Light And Holstering Ignore Timescale
description: Make using PipBoy light or holster hotkeys not take longer when time is slowed down.

name: Hostiles Use Neutral Color On Compass
description: Make hostiles on the compass use the HUDMain color instead of HUDAlt (red).

name: Agility Scales Jump Height
description: Scale jump height based on agility. Formula: jumpHeight = 1 + (fAgilityMult * (agility - 1))

subsettings.name: Agility Multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier added per agility point above 1.

name: Using Keys Rewards XP
description: Gain XP when using keys on locks. Formula: RewardXP = (Base XP) + (Vanilla Lock XP) * (Vanilla Reward Scale).

subsettings.name: Base XP
subsettings.description: XP rewarded for using a key on a container/door.

subsettings.name: Vanilla Reward Scale
subsettings.description: Scale applied to the vanilla XP gained based on the lock level. Impossible locks grant the same as Very Hard locks.

name: Anim Debugging
description: Prints which anims are currently active into the top left of the console {you can type ToggleDebugText (TDT) to see console output with the console closed}.

name: Partial Reload Anim Support
description: Add support for 'partial' reload anims when reloading with a non-empty clip. Makes the game select animations ending in '_partial' for the player if their clip is empty.

name: NPCs Earn Ammo Casings
description: Make NPCs earn ammo casings when firing their weapons.

name: Drowning Drains AP
description: Drain action points before taking damage when drowning.

name: Faster Enter Lockpick Menu
description: Speed up the animation for entering the lockpick menu.

name: Prevent Inactive Window Scrolling
description: Prevent scroll-wheel affecting windows outside NV.

name: AddItem Uses Item Icon
description: Use the item icon (if it exists) in 'added to inventory' messages (you will need an icon replacer or they will be off-centered), instead of always using the gift icon.

name: Allow Weapon Hotkeys While Equipping
description: Allow use of weapon hotkeys while switching weapons.

name: Show Nearest Undiscovered Location
description: Always show the nearest undiscovered location on the compass or map.

subsettings.name: Show On Map
subsettings.description: Show the closest undiscovered location on the map.

subsettings.name: Show On Compass
subsettings.description: Show the closest undiscovered location on the compass.

name: Weapon Cycle Up Down Hotkeys
description: Use left/right controller d-pad to cycle through hotkeyed weapons.

name: Repair Requires Weapon Skill
description: Disallow repairing if repair skill is less than the weapon's skill requirement. i.e. you need 75 repair skill to fix a weapon that requires 75 energy weapons skill.

name: Max VATS Distance Uses Weapon Range
description: Use the player's weapon max range to determine the max VATS targeting distance - e.g. you can target enemies further with a sniper rifle than a 9mm pistol.

subsettings.name: Min Distance
subsettings.description: Minimum range to check for targets.

subsettings.name: Max Distance
subsettings.description: Maximum range to check for targets.

subsettings.name: Weapon Range Multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to the weapon's max range.

name: Less Frequent Player Pain Sounds
description: Add a minimum interval between player pain sounds.

subsettings.name: Interval (MS)
subsettings.description: Minimum time between player pain sounds in milliseconds.

name: More Frequent NPC Light Updates
description: Calculate actor light levels (used for sneaking) more frequently - may incur a minor performance penalty if the interval is too low.

subsettings.name: Detection Timer Interval
subsettings.description: Time between updates (in seconds), vanilla is 3 seconds.

name: Map Zooms On Cursor
description: Makes zooming in the local and world map center on where the cursor is instead of the middle of the screen.

name: Lock Pick Menu Keyboard Movement
description: Use left/right movement to control the bobby pin, and jump and forward/back to spin the screwdriver.

subsettings.name: Base Speed
subsettings.description: Base speed for left/right bobby pin movement.

subsettings.name: Shift Speed Multiplier
subsettings.description: Scale applied to movement speed while shift is held.

subsettings.name: CTRL Speed Multiplier
subsettings.description: Scale applied while ctrl is held.

name: Saving Doesn't Close Pause Menu
description: Keep the pause menu open after saving the game.

name: Container Menu Store All Hotkey
description: Hold shift to store all visible (i.e. not filtered out via category/menu search etc.) items from the left hand side into the current container.

subsettings.name: Store All Label
subsettings.description: Replacement label for 'Take All' when shift is held.

name: Container Take All Doesn't Close Menu
description: Prevent the 'take all' button closing the container.

name: Take All Confirmation
description: Show a confirmation message when taking all items from a container.

subsettings.name: Min Items For Message
subsettings.description: Minimum number of items for the message to appear.

subsettings.name: Confirmation Prompt Text
subsettings.description: Confirmation message for taking all items.

name: Bloody Mess Gibs Targeted Limb Only
description: Prevents bloody mess dismembering/exploding limbs that weren't hit. In vanilla there's a random chance an npc's limb is removed when shooting their torso.

name: Deselect Hotkeys
description: Makes it possible to remove a hotkey for an item by attempting to assign it the slot it has already.

name: Sort Recipe Menu
description: Sort the crafting menu.

name: Timescale Affects Reload Sounds
description: Scale reload sound pitch and length based on the game time multiplier (e.g. while using turbo).

name: No Poison Confirm
description: Remove the confirmation prompt when poisoning a weapon, and replace the warning popups with a corner message instead.

name: Taking NPC Weapons Gives No Ammo
description: Don't earn extra ammo when taking an NPCs weapon. In the base game, you can earn a random amount of ammo (based on clip size) when taking the equipped weapon of an NPC who died (before reloading the game). e.g. taking a .357 revolver will give anywhere between 0-6 ammo.

name: No Exit Game Confirmation
description: Skip the exit confirmation when clicking Quit Game in the main menu.

name: Living Anatomy Shows DR
description: Show damage resistance when using the living anatomy perk, and remove decimal places. Additionally hides the DR/DT if they are zero.

subsettings.name: Show Even At Max Health
subsettings.description: Show the targeted NPC's health-bar even if they have max health.

name: Preview Perks On Level-Up
description: Always show the perk screen when leveling up even if you have no points to assign.

name: Place Markers At Locations
description: Makes right clicking in the map menu to place a marker place it directly on the hovered location.

subsettings.name: Affect Local Map
subsettings.description: Center markers on doors in the local map.

name: Allow Pickpocket If Already Caught
description: Allow pickpocketing even if the NPC has caught you previously.

name: Hide Crosshair In Killcams
description: Hide the crosshair during killcams.

name: Hide Healthbar In Killcams
description: Hide the health-bar during killcams.

name: HUD Rotates With Vanity Cam
description: Move the compass when rotating while holding the POV button for the vanity camera.

name: HUD Weapon Name Label
description: Show the current weapon name above AP when it's equipped. Customizable by editing 'menus/prefabs/lStewieAl/WeaponNameLabel.xml'.

name: Compress Duplicate Console Messages
description: Append -#count to consecutive duplicate single line console messages.

name: No Pipboy Idle Anims
description: Prevent the PipBoy idle anims (used for swaying left/right in vanilla) from playing. In vanilla these are: Characters/male/IdleAnims/1stPPipBoyWaver.kf etc.

name: Save Character Selector
description: Add a character selector for filtering the save/load menu, to make it easy to find saves from different created with different character names. Uses: menus/prefabs/lStewieAl/SaveCharacterSelector.xml.

subsettings.name: No Filter Active Text
subsettings.description: Text to display in the Save/Load menu while character filter isn't applied.

name: No Fast Travel If Legs Crippled
description: Prevent fast travel if a leg is crippled.

subsettings.name: Message
subsettings.description: Message shown when attempting to fast travel with broken legs.

name: Weapon Hotkeys Holster Weapon If Equipped
description: Pressing the hotkey for the current equipped weapon will holster or draw instead of unequipping.

subsettings.name: Don't Holster Weapon
subsettings.description: Pressing the weapon key for an already equipped weapon will do nothing (instead of unequipping).

name: Prevent Repair If Not At Workbench
description: Prevent repairing items if you aren't looking at a workbench.

name: Improved Race Menu
description: Allow panning the camera with right click or Y on controller, and increase min zoom.

subsettings.name: Prevent Player Movement
subsettings.description: Prevent anims (swaying etc.) playing in the menu.

subsettings.name: Pan X Movement Speed
subsettings.description: Scale the right click pan X direction movement speed.

subsettings.name: Pan Y Movement Speed
subsettings.description: Scale the right click pan Y direction movement speed.

name: Map Markers Show Faction Name
description: Show the faction name underneath the map marker name, e.g. (Goodsprings - Neutral).

subsettings.name: Hide If No Reputation
subsettings.description: Only show location reputations if you have reputation with that faction.

name: Container Right Click Changes To Previous Category
description: Make right clicking the category cycle to the previous category in container/barter/recipe menus.

name: Invalid BSFadeNode Prints
description: Disables the '[Tweaks] Invalid BSFadeNode Detected - Linked Obj ID: %08X' warning. If you're an author I recommend you leave it on so you know which of your meshes are broken. Setting is hidden (add bInvalidBSFadeNodePrints=0 under [Tweaks] to disable).

name: Hide Reputation Tab If Empty
description: Hides the Stats menu reputation tab and button if you don't have any faction reputations (mainly for use with TTW).

name: Show Active Quest Notes Shows All Started Quests
description: Make the 'Show Active Quest Notes' button show notes for all started, non-completed quests.

name: Hide Hotkeyed Items In Barter
description: Hides hotkeyed items in the barter menu.

name: Hide Hotkeyed Items In Containers
description: Hides hotkeyed items in the container menu.

name: Numbered Computer Hotkeys
description: Adds hotkeys 0-9 to select options in the computers menu.

subsettings.name: Show List Number
subsettings.description: Prepend the list number to each menu option.

name: Show Book Effects
description: Show book effects when viewing them in the PipBoy. e.g. 'Permanent Speech +1'.

subsettings.name: Effect Prefix
subsettings.description: Prefix shown before the {SKILL} + 1.

name: Auto Continue Game
description: Automatically continue game at the start menu.

name: Sort Misc Stats
description: Sort the misc stats page of the Stats menu.

name: Show Take All In Companion Containers
description: Show the 'Take All' button when viewing companion inventories.

name: Prevent Bush Passthrough Sounds
description: Prevent sounds playing when walking through bushes.

name: Synchronize Container Categories
description: Synchronize the left/right item categories like in Fallout 4.

subsettings.name: Prevent Auto-Switching When Taking Last Item
subsettings.description: Prevent the category automatically changing when transferring the last item in a category.

name: Randomize Killcam Mode
description: Randomly alternate between cinematic/player view kill-cams.

name: No Damage Melee Weapon If Target Dead
description: Don't decrease the health of a melee weapon when hitting dead NPCs.

name: Lockpick Hacking Message Shows Current Skill
description: Show the current lockpick/hacking skill levels in the 'You need X skill to hack this terminal' messages.

name: No Drop Weapon Sound On Player Death
description: Prevent the unequip sound when the player dies.

name: Toggle Controller If Attack Pressed
description: Swap to controller when A is pressed, or keyboard/mouse when left clicking.

subsettings.name: Prevent Controller Connected Popup
subsettings.description: Prevent the 'Turn off 360 Controller in the Controls...' popup.

name: Climb Steeper Slopes
description: Allow adjusting the max walking/jumping/autowalk angles. Vanilla is 47 degrees.

subsettings.name: Max Walk Angle
subsettings.description: Max angle while walking (in degrees).

subsettings.name: Max Jump Angle
subsettings.description: Max angle while jump is held (in degrees).

subsettings.name: Max AutoWalk Angle
subsettings.description: Max angle while autowalk is active (in degrees).

name: Screenshot Key
description: Allows changing the default screenshot hotkey (from Print Scrn)

name: Pipboy Stats Key
description: Allows changing the default Pipboy Stats hotkey (from F1)

name: Pipboy Items Key
description: Allows changing the default Pipboy Items hotkey (from F2)

name: Pipboy Data Key
description: Allows changing the default Pipboy Data hotkey (from F3)

name: VATS Accept Key
description: Allows changing the default VATS Accept key (from E)

name: Console Key
description: Allows changing the default console hotkey (from ~)

name: Exit To Main Menu Key
description: Add a key to exit to the main menu.

name: Exit Game Key
description: Adds a key to exit the game.

name: Disable Collision Key
description: Disables player collision while held.

name: Toggle Pipboy Light Key
description: Toggles the PipBoy light, and the night vision scope effect if bAddNightVisionToggle is enabled.

name: Holster Weapon Key
description: Holster the current weapon, disables holding reload to holster weapon.

name: Open Quests Key
description: GameMode key to open the PipBoy quests tab, J key switches to the tab while in the PipBoy Menu.

name: Open Radios Key
description: GameMode key to open the PipBoy radios tab, P key switches to the tab while in the PipBoy menu.

name: Radio Volume Down Key
description: GameMode key to decrease the radio volume.

name: Radio Volume Up Key
description: GameMode key to increase the radio volume.

name: Toggle Menus Key
description: Toggles the visibility of all menus (as the ToggleMenus command).

name: Toggle True Ironsights Key
description: Toggles true ironsights mode.

name: Toggle Crosshair Key
description: Toggles visibility of the crosshair.

name: Open Local Map Key
description: GameMode key to open the PipBoy local map, N key switches to the map while in the PipBoy Menu.

name: Toggle Sighting Node Key
description: Switch ironsights node to using '##SightingNode2' if the weapon has one. Resets when changing weapons.

name: Toggle Sneak Indicator Key
description: Toggles whether the sneak indicator is hidden.

name: Drop Equipped Weapon Key
description: Drops the equipped weapon.

name: Toggle Smooth Camera Key
description: Toggles a cinematic camera, smoothing mouse/controller movements.

name: Radio Station Next Key
description: Select the next radio station.

name: Radio Station Previous Key
description: Select the previous radio station.

name: Radio Skip Song Key
description: Skip the current radio song or topic.

name: Open Map Key
description: GameMode key to open the PipBoy world map, M key switches to the map while in the PipBoy Menu.

subsettings.name: Show Local Map In Interiors
subsettings.description: Open the local map instead of the world map when in interiors.

name: Repeated Activate Key
description: Continually presses the use key while held

subsettings.name: Only Take Items
subsettings.description: Only take items while the key is held (i.e. don't open doors, speak to NPCs etc.).

name: Hide HUD Key
description: Hides various elements on the main HUD.

subsettings.name: Hide By Default
subsettings.description: Hide the HUD when loading a save.

name: Equip Last Weapon Key
description: Equips the last equipped weapon.

subsettings.name: Ignore Throwables
subsettings.description: Don't set the last equipped weapon to be a thrown weapon.

subsettings.name: Mousewheel Support
subsettings.description: Make scrolling up/down change weapons.

subsettings.name: Ignore non-damage weapons
subsettings.description: Ignore non-melee weapons with no projectiles.

name: Max Character Level
description: Sets the max player level and disables the hard-coded +5 per DLC.

subsettings.name: Level
subsettings.description: Max player level (1-65535).

name: Perk Point Modifier
description: Earn more perks at the perk allocation screen (not to be confused with the iLevelsPerPerk gamesetting, which affects the level gap between level-ups that let you choose a Perk.)

subsettings.name: Perks Per Level
subsettings.description: Perk-points at the perk allocation screen.

name: Item Repair List Preview
description: Show which items can be used to repair the current weapon/armor when holding ALT and opening the repair menu.

name: Strength-based Explosion Knockdown Chance
description: Make explosion knockdown avoidance chance use strength instead of agility (affects NPCs and the player).

name: Mousewheel Scrolls Weapon Hotkeys
description: Add mousewheel to scroll through hotkeyed weapons.

subsettings.name: Invert Scroll
subsettings.description: Invert the weapon swap direction.

name: Cap Skills By SPECIAL
description:
Cap the levelup menu max skill values based on SPECIAL skills.
skillCap = min(iSkillCap, fSkillBase + (specialVal * fSPECIALMult) + luckVal * fLuckMult)
Strength - Melee Weapons
Perception - Energy Weapons, Explosives, Lockpick
Endurance - Big Guns, Survival, Unarmed
Charisma - Barter, Speech
Intelligence - Medicine, Repair, Science
Agility - Guns, Sneak

subsettings.name: Skill Cap
subsettings.description: Max points in any skill.

subsettings.name: Skill Base
subsettings.description: Base value before SPECIALs are added.

subsettings.name: Points per SPECIAL
subsettings.description: Points added per SPECIAL skill.

subsettings.name: Points added per Luck
subsettings.description: Points added per Luck.

name: Run & Gun AP In Combat Only
description: Use the fActionPointsRunAndGunMult in combat only.

name: Disarming Mines Picks Them Up
description: Automatically pick up explosives after disarming them.

name: Crit Chance Ignores Fire Rate
description: Don't divide crit chance by fire rate for automatic weapons.

name: Hide Hotkeyed Items In Repair Lists
description: Hides hotkeyed items in the pipboy repair menu.

name: Stats Menu Shows Effect Time Remaining
description: Show the time remaining for effects in the Stats menu (excludes named effects like 'Psycho' or 'Well Rested').

name: Use Long Ammo Name On HUD
description: Show the full or pipboy/shorthand name for ammo on the HUD instead of the abbreviation. Requires a UI mod since it clips with the CND bar.

subsettings.name: Use Pipboy Name
subsettings.description: Use the shorthand name for ammo (e.g. 20ga S) instead of the full name of the ammo (e.g. 20 Gauge, Slug).

name: Per Bullet Looping Reload
description: Require pressing reload N times to load N rounds for looping reload weapons. e.g. pressing reload twice will load two bullets into a reload loop weapon.

subsettings.name: Max Reload Queue Length
subsettings.description: Max number of bullets to queue by pressing reload multiple times, set to 0 for no limit.

subsettings.name: Max Reload Queue Length
subsettings.description: Number of bullets to queue per reload press.

name: No Player Stagger Anims
description: Disable player stagger animations when limbs are crippled.

name: Console Prints Include Timestamp
description: Include a timestamp in console messages.

subsettings.name: Timestamp Format
subsettings.description: Hour Minute Second Millisecond

name: Scale Player Melee Reach
description: Scale the distance the player hit with melee weapons.

subsettings.name: Reach Multiplier
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to melee weapon range.

subsettings.name: Minimum Reach
subsettings.description: Minimum reach, set to 0 to have no minimum.

subsettings.name: Maximum Reach
subsettings.description: Maximum reach, set to 0 to have no maximum.

name: Player Marker Height Indicator
description: Add an indicator whether the player placed marker is above or below if the marker is in another cell.

subsettings.name: Use Door Icon
subsettings.description: Use glow_hud_compass_pc_marker_door.dds for doors.

name: No Lock Encounter Zone Levels
description: Don't freeze the level of encounter zones. In the base game visiting a dungeon will permanently cap the level of enemies and loot there to your level. This tweak changes it so that there is no difference in level between entering a new dungeon and a previously visited one.

name: Changing Container Category Scrolls To Top
description: Scroll to the top when changing container/barter categories.

name: More Precise Radiation Meter
description: Display radiation level to more decimal places.

subsettings.name: Format
subsettings.description: Format for radiation meter text, supports 0-9 decimal places with %.1f, %.2f etc.

name: Aiming Unholsters Weapons
description: Unholster weapons when aiming.

name: Inventory Alternate Ammo Indicator
description: Show a + beside ammo count in inventory menus if you have any alternate ammos.

name: Reload While Firing
description: Allow reloading while firing anims play.

name: Repair Scales Crafting Condition
description: Scale initial health of crafted items based on repair skill.

name: Scale Explosion Shake
description: Scale the camera/HUD shake caused by explosions.

subsettings.name: Camera Shake Mult
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to camera shake.

subsettings.name: HUD Shake Mult
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to HUD shake.

name: Mark Nearby Locations On Map
description: Permanently reveal nearby locations markers on the pipboy map (as if an NPC had given you the marker).

subsettings.name: Radius
subsettings.description: Radius of circle around player to add markers. If you want them to be added when they appear on the compass, set this to the value of the iMapMarkerVisibleDistance gamesetting (default is 20000)

name: Prevent Stealing Caps After Repair
description: Place caps in merchant containers instead of their inventory when using repair services.

subsettings.name: Destroy caps if vendor has no container
subsettings.description: Destroy the caps if the merchant has no vendor container, otherwise they are given to the actor

name: Prevent NPC Comments
description: Prevent NPCs commenting when you knock over objects, look at locked containers etc.

subsettings.name: Prevented Topic Flags
subsettings.description: Hexadecimal value containing the sum of all the desired flags. e.g. 0x880 would prevent KnockOverObject and LockedTerminalOrContainerInCrosshair. See the readme for available flags.

name: Companions Use Location Font On Map
description: Use the same font as locations for companions on the map. Vanilla is hardcoded to use font 2.

name: Remove Queued Cripple/Critical Messages For Dead NPCs
description: Remove queued cripple/critical messages for dead NPCs. This prevents the spam of 'Limb crippled...' after a target dies from explosions for example.

name: Show 'Use Password' On Terminals With Password Note
description: Show '[Locked - Use Password]' on terminals if you have the password note. Additionally marks terminals as unlocked once you've opened them with the note.

subsettings.name: Prompt string
subsettings.description: Prompt when you already have the terminal's password note, [Locked - sUsePassword].

name: Hide Read Notes
description: Hide notes that have been read already in the notes menu.

name: Explosion Knockback Direction Fix
description: Push targets away from explosions instead of the actor who created them. This also allows you to move yourself with your own explosions.

name: Show Barter Total When Over Sell Limit
description: Show the total barter amount when the total is more than the merchant's caps.

name: Allow Aid At Max Health
description: Allow using stimpaks, super stimpaks and doctors bags when at max health/limb condition.

name: Barter Quantity Menu Shows Price
description: Show the total price of the selected quantity menu items when bartering.

name: Kill Challenge Source Weapon Fix
description: Use the last weapon that damaged an NPC instead of the currently equipped weapon for kill challenges. This means that using grenades will correctly increase their kill challenges. Note: weapons that are scripted to directly use the Kill command will not increase the challenges.

name: Hide No Fast Travel Message
description: Prevent the sNoFastTravelUndiscovered message when clicking on an undiscovered map marker.

subsettings.name: Play Cancel Sound
subsettings.description: Play the UIMenuCancel sound when trying to click on an undiscovered marker.

name: Separate Horizontal Sensitivity
description: Use a separate slider for horizontal/vertical sensitivity in the vanilla controls menu.

name: Explosions Don't Push Collectible Items
description: Prevent explosions moving items if they can be taken.

name: Prevent Visible Stuck Projectile Despawning
description: Prevent stuck projectiles despawning if you're facing them.

name: Keep Weapon Visible During Dialogue
description: Keeps player weapon visible while in dialogue.

name: NPCs Drop Live Grenades
description: Crippling/killing an enemy mid-throw causes them to drop the live grenade.

name: Allow Non-Power Attacks While Sneaking
description: Allow melee/unarmed non-power attacks while sneaking.

name: Silent Sneak Power Attacks
description: Prevent player grunting while using a melee/unarmed power attack if sneaking.

name: Disarm Requires Skill
description:
Add random chance mines will not disarm or explode instantly based on the weapon's skill requirements. If a disarm fails, there's a chance the mine will instantly explode.
Formula:   disarmChance = fDisarmMult * (playerSkill + perception - 5) * 100.0F / requiredSkill
explodeChance = fExplodeMult * (requiredSkill - playerSkill + (5 - luck)) * 2

subsettings.name: Explode Mult
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to instant explosion chance.

subsettings.name: Disarm Mult
subsettings.description: Multiplier applied to disarm chance.

name: Toggle POV When Holstering Weapon
description: Toggle 1st person when reading a weapon, and 3rd when holstering.

name: Power Attack If Blocking
description: Remove the melee power attack delay while blocking.

name: Select Unavailable Radios
description: Allow selecting unavailable radios to use when back in range.

name: Radio Static Decreases Song Volume
description: Make songs quieter when static is playing near the edge of a radio's range.

name: Radio Keep Song Position Between Saves
description: If a song is playing on the radio, don't rewind it when loading a save that has the same song playing.

name: Weapon Impact Effects
description: Spawn sparks and play impact sounds when equipped/holstered weapons are hit.

name: Double Jump
description: Allow jumping in mid-air.

subsettings.name: Max Mid-air Jumps
subsettings.description: Max additional jumps.

subsettings.name: Mid-air Jump Height Scale
subsettings.description: Scale applied to mid-air jumps.

subsettings.name: AP Cost
subsettings.description: Action Point cost to jump in mid-air.

subsettings.name: Jump Sound
subsettings.description: Sound played when jumping in mid-air.

subsettings.name: Jump Volume
subsettings.description: Time (in seconds) after falling where initial jumps don't increase the jump counter.

subsettings.name: Mid-air Timer
subsettings.description: Time (in seconds) after falling where initial jumps don't increase the jump counter.

subsettings.name: Keep Fall Height
subsettings.description: Don't reset the fall damage height when jumping in mid-air.

name: Explosion Radius Buff
description: Make inner 30% of explosion radius deal full damage and minimum damage at radius be 20%.

subsettings.name: Inner Radius
subsettings.description: Radius that deals 100% damage.

subsettings.name: Outer Radius Damage
subsettings.description: Damage dealt at the outer radius.

name: Detached Beams
description: Prevent beam projectiles sticking to the weapon barrel when turning.

name: Smoother Controller Aiming
description:
Significantly smoothens the right thumbstick deadzone curve for looking around.
Recommend pairing with bDisableControllerDeadzones.

name: Allow Binding Duplicate Controls
description: Allow binding multiple controls to the same button in the vanilla settings menu. The base game swaps the controls around when you try this.

name: Crippled Legs Scale Jump Height
description: Scale jump height if legs are crippled.

subsettings.name: One Leg Mult
subsettings.description: Jump height scale with one crippled leg.

subsettings.name: Two Legs Mult
subsettings.description: Jump height scale with one crippled leg.

name: PipBoy Tab Hotkeys Don't Close Menu
description: Prevent the pipboy tab hotkeys (F1/F2/F3 by default) closing the pipboy.

name: Stats Menu Show Skill/SPECIAL Modifiers
description: Show the value modifier amount in the (+) and (-) for skills, and show skills/specials above 10/100. VUI+ strongly recommended.

subsettings.name: Show values above their limits
subsettings.description: Show SPECIALs above 10 and skills above 100.

name: Lethal Hits Increase Limb Challenges
description: Increase limb cripple/knockback challenges even if the attack killed the target.

name: Reloading With No Ammo Swaps Ammo Types
description: Change ammo types when reloading with no ammo, and when loading a save with no ammo.

name: Custom Terminal Fade Time
description: Adjust the time the terminal menu fades out when closed with keyboard/controller.

subsettings.name: Fade Length
subsettings.description: Length of time the terminal menu fades for when closed with keyboard/controller.

name: Main Menu Continue Save Icon
description: Show the image of the save to load when 'Continue' is hovered at the main menu.

name: Entering VATS Doesn't Unholster Weapon
description: Don't unholster weapon when using VATS without selecting a target.

name: Power Armor Prevents Screen Blood
description: Prevent screen blood effect if your hit body part is wearing power armor.

name: Power Armor Scales Limb Damage
description: Scale limb damage for hits on power armor for the player and NPCs.

subsettings.name: Head Scale
subsettings.description: Scale applied to head damage while wearing a power armor helmet.

subsettings.name: Limb Scale
subsettings.description: Scale applied to limb damage while wearing a power armor helmet.

name: Prevent Hitting Holstered Weapons
description: Make projectiles pass through NPC holstered weapons.

subsettings.name: Prevent hitting unholstered weapons
subsettings.description: Ignore hitting unholstered weapons (prevents disarming).

subsettings.name: Allow Hits In VATS
subsettings.description: Allow hitting weapons in VATS.

name: Hide Quest Item Weight And Value
description: Hide the weight and value of quest items and keys in the PipBoy.

name: NPCs Hear Mines Explode
description: Alert nearby NPCs when mines explode.

name: Crippled Limb Pain Sound When Falling
description: Play pain sounds when falling with crippled legs.

subsettings.name: Height Threshold
subsettings.description: Distance fallen to play pain sound/imod if either leg is crippled.

name: Terminal Grey Read Notes
description: Grays notes after reading them in the terminal (not retroactive).

name: Sort Equipable Ammo To Top Of Inventory
description: Sorts usable ammo to the top of the PipBoy inventory.

name: Hide Caps Added Messages
description: Hide item added messages for caps.

name: Splash Damage Affects Bloody Mess Gibbing
description: Gives projectile splash damage a chance to trigger bloody mess torso explosions.

name: Free Wild Wasteland
description: Allow selecting wild wasteland without using a trait slot.

name: Invert Camera X
description: Invert the camera X movement.

name: Clear Nearby Player Marker
description: Remove player placed marker when nearby.

subsettings.name: Distance
subsettings.description: Distance to remove the marker.

name: Light Step Affects Companions
description: Give companions light step if player has the perk.

name: VATS AP Display Includes Reload Cost
description: Include the cost of a reload (fActionPointsReload gamesetting) when queuing a VATS attack that will cause a reload.

name: Skip Very Easy Locks At Max Skill
description: Automatically unlock very easy locks when lockpick skill is maxed.

name: Multithreaded Hacking Menu
description: Multithreads the setup of the hacking words list to reduce lag when hacking a terminal.

name: Mark Notes As Unread
description: Adds right click to mark a note as unread.

name: Custom Popup Icons
description: Adds configurable icons to popup messages.

name: Prevent Gib Sound When Entering Cells
description: Prevent body part explosion sounds when entering cells.

name: Local Map Separate Interior/Exterior Door Icon
description: Use a separate icon for local map doors which lead to an exterior.

name: Challenge Menu Icons
description: Use challenge icons in the pipboy challenges menu (requires a mod that adds icons to the Challenge forms).

name: Pause Holotapes
description: Make clicking on the current holotape pause it, double tapping pause resets the holotape.

subsettings.name: Pause In Dialog Menu
subsettings.description: Pause holotapes while the Dialog menu is open.

name: Improved Weather
description: Prevent weather changes when fast traveling short distances.

subsettings.name: Fast Travel Weather Change Distance Threshold
subsettings.description: Minimum fast travel distance for a weather change.

name: Compass Shows Location Name
description: Show the name of the nearest location marker you're looking towards.

subsettings.name: Hide Undiscovered Names
subsettings.description: Whether names of undiscovered locations should be hidden.

subsettings.name: Show Distance
subsettings.description: Show the distance to the marker.

subsettings.name: Max Angle
subsettings.description: Maximum Angle to show the location name.

subsettings.name: Angle Offset
subsettings.description: Offset of angle (to adjust for the location icon being off-centered).

subsettings.name: Delay
subsettings.description: Delay (in seconds) before the location name is shown.

name: Scale Ashpile Size
description: Scale the size of ashpiles depending on actor size - note some creatures such as Bloatflies have large bounds which affects their ashpile size.

subsettings.name: Min Scale
subsettings.description: Minimum scale applied to ashpiles.

subsettings.name: Max Scale
subsettings.description: Maximum scale applied to ashpiles.

name: Target Projectiles in VATS
description: Allow targeting projectiles in VATS. The percentage hit chance doesn't take the visibility of the projectile into account, only the distance + player skill.

name: Quickload from Main/Start Menu
description: Add support for the QuickLoad key in the Main/Pause menus.

name: Show Quest Objectives On Cell Change
description: Show quest objectives when changing cells.

subsettings.name: Min Interval
subsettings.description: Prevent showing objectives again within this time (in seconds).

name: Contact Mines
description: Instantly detonate mines when they are stood on.

name: Allow Jams While Firing Automatic Weapons
description: Allow firing anim jams to play while firing an automatic weapon. In vanilla only the first shot can jam. Note that you need to edit the fWeaponConditionJam1/fWeaponConditionJam2... gamesettings to add a chance for any jams while firing.

name: Click To Exit Load Screens
description: Require clicking to exit load screens.

subsettings.name: Hide Loading Wheel When Finished
subsettings.description: Hide the loading wheel when loading is finished.

subsettings.name: Load Game Only
subsettings.description: Don't require clicking through fast travel/exterior load screens.

name: Hide Cursor In Message Menu
description: Hide the cursor in the message popup windows.

name: Chance Based Killcams
description: Give a chance the cinematic/player view killcam will play when killing the last of a combat group.

subsettings.name: Chance
subsettings.description: Percentage chance the cinematic/player view killcam will play when killing the last of a combat group.

name: Keep Quest Update Text Visible In Menus
description: Keep the quest/location added text visible in the PipBoy and Hacking menus, and while sitting down.

name: Skip Load Save Confirmation Prompt
description: Skip the confirmation prompt when loading a save.

subsettings.name: Main Menu Only
subsettings.description: Only skip the confirmation at the main menu.

name: Color Weapon Condition Label
description: Allow coloring the weapon low condition label.

subsettings.name: Blink Threshold
subsettings.description: Threshold health percent for label to blink.

subsettings.name: Color Threshold
subsettings.description: Threshold health percent for label to turn red.

name: Armor Condition Label
description: Add an armor condition label to the HUD.

subsettings.name: Armor Label
subsettings.description: Label shown beside the armor meter.

subsettings.name: Weapon Label
subsettings.description: Replacement label beside the weapon meter (leave blank to use vanilla string).

subsettings.name: Blink Threshold
subsettings.description: Threshold health percent for label to blink.

subsettings.name: Color Threshold
subsettings.description: Threshold health percent for label to turn red.

subsettings.name: Visibility Threshold
subsettings.description: Threshold health percent for label to turn visible (set to 0 to disable).

name: Move Ammo Type Label
description: Moves the ammo type label to under the ammo count.

name: Armor DT Prevents Blood Decals
description: Prevent blood decals for attacks that don't penetrate target DT.

name: Enemy Healthbar Shows Buffed HP
description: Include health modifiers in enemy healthbars (e.g. buffout).

name: Place Marker At Current Position Hotkey
description: Places the map marker at your current position.

subsettings.name: Message
subsettings.description: Message to show when placing a marker, leave blank for none.

subsettings.name: Sound
subsettings.description: EditorID of sound to play when placing a marker, leave blank for none.

name: Sleep On Chairs
description: Sleep when waiting on chairs.

name: Sleep Wait Slider Show Wake Time
description: Show the wake time on the sleep/wait slider instead of hours.

name: Crippling Doesn't Disarm NPCs
description: Prevent NPCs dropping their weapons when arms are crippled.

name: Keep Fall Height When Loading Saves
description: Prevent fall height being reset when loading a save.

name: Revive Unconscious Companions
description: Use stimpaks to revive unconscious companions.

subsettings.name: Prompt
subsettings.description: Prompt shown when mousing over an unconscious companion.

subsettings.name: Unconscious Time
subsettings.description: Duration companions stay knocked out. Set to 0 to use the vanilla fEssentialDeathTime gamesetting.

name: Heartbeat Sounds Fade
description: Fade the volume of heartbeat sounds, reset the volume when taking damage.

subsettings.name: Duration
subsettings.description: Duration for the sound fading in seconds.

subsettings.name: Easing function
subsettings.description: Which easing function will be applied to the volume (see easings.net).

name: Play Armor Sounds In 3D
description: Play armor foley sounds in 3D when in 3rd person.

name: Sort Pipboy Repair Menu
description: Sort the pipboy repair menu alphabetically, placing items equal to the repair item first.

name: Disable Invisibility In PipBoy
description: Disable the invisibility effect from stealth boys etc. while the pipboy is open.

name: Barter Show Caps Change
description: Show the final caps after a transaction beside player/merchant caps.

options.name: Text
options.description: Show { current -> final } for the caps display.

options.name: Brightness
options.description: Show the final caps display and adjust the text brightness.

name: Companions Don't Consume Ammo
description: Don't remove ammo from companions when they fire weapons.

name: Ammo Burst Case Count Fix
description: Give a chance to earn multiple ammo casings from weapons that use more than 1 ammo per shot (e.g. the Tri-Beam laser rifle).

name: Reallocate Skill Points On LevelUp
description: Allow reassigning all skill points when leveling up.

name: Use Weapon Repair Kits In Repair Menu
description: Show repair kits in the weapon repair menu.

subsettings.name: Repair Text
subsettings.internalCategory: Use Repair Kits In Repair Menu
subsettings.description: Text to display instead of 'Repair' if you only have repair kits.

name: Strength Affects All Throwable Distances
description: Make the fThrowingStrengthPenalty gamesetting also affect grenades and mines.

name: Map Remembers Position
description: Remember the last viewed position in the Map Menu.

subsettings.name: Save Persistent
subsettings.description: Remember the map position for each save.

name: Map Recenter Hotkey
description: Add a hotkey to recenter the map menu.

subsettings.name: Easing Time
subsettings.description: Duration of the recenter movement (in milliseconds).

subsettings.name: Easing function
subsettings.description: Which easing function will be applied to the movement (see easings.net).

name: Map Locations Show Distance
description: Show the distance to the hovered location marker in the Map Menu.

subsettings.name: Display Mode
subsettings.description: Display mode.

name: Barter Affects Repair Costs
description: Scale NPC repair prices based on your barter skill and perk modifiers.

subsettings.name: Base Cost
subsettings.description: Base cost.

subsettings.name: Cost Multiplier
subsettings.description: Price decrease per barter point.

subsettings.name: Minimum Cost Multiplier
subsettings.description: Minimum multiplier.

name: Containers Show Equipped Ammo
description: Show the 'equipped' square beside equipped ammos in containers.

name: Quantity Menu Respects Companion Carry Limit
description: Limit the quantity menu max count when transferring items that would overburden a companion.

name: Show Voice Acting Notes in Dialogue
description: Display the voice acting notes e.g. {afterthought} in dialogue.
